title: Stimmung okay, groÃŸe BetonwÃ¼ste, angemessene Preise
text: Die Anreise mit der Bahn war unkompliziert und einfach. Am Stadion muss man als GÃ¤stefan dann aber einen ziemlichen FuÃŸmarsch auf sich nehmen, um zum GÃ¤steblock zu gelangen, der ist aber gut ausgeschildert.Was diese Fantrennung soll ist aber auch irgendwie nicht ganz ersichtlich, da sich an der Arena eh alle Fans wieder mischen.SchÃ¶n ist es an der Arena nicht, da mag sie selbst noch so beeindruckend sein, es ist eine riesige, unpersÃ¶nliche BetonwÃ¼ste. Da backe ich als Paderborner zwar selbst kleine BrÃ¶tchen, hatte von der Allianzarena aber irgendwie mehr erwartet.Im Block waren ausgerechnet in unserer Reihe alle Sitze falsch nummeriert (die 7 gab es 2x,  die PlÃ¤tze 8 und 9 waren zwischen 10 und 11 usw.) was problematisch ist, wenn der Ordner einen dazu auffordert, sich hinzusetzen und stÃ¤ndig wieder aufscheucht, weil keiner weiÃŸ, wo er denn nun sitzt...Ticketpreis war dafÃ¼r aber voll angemessen!Stimmung beim Spiel (und wir hatten ja nun ein wirklich spannendes Spiel erwischt) hÃ¤tte besser sein kÃ¶nnen, vielleicht schlagen Gegentore aber auch einfach zu stark auf den empfindlichen MÃ¼nchener Magen ;) Das nur nebenbei, dafÃ¼r kann die Arena ja nix)Dass man bei jedem Gang zu Toilette und Bratwurst so eine Wiedereinlasskarte ausgehÃ¤ndigt bekommt nervt ein bisschen. Essen war fÃ¼r "StadionfraÃŸ" in Ordnung.Wieder drauÃŸen ist die U-Bahn dann leider erdenklich schlecht ausgeschildert, denn auf dem RÃ¼ckweg muss man nicht den gleichen Weg nehmen wie auf dem Hinweg.Alles in allem okay. Gibt wahrscheinlich Fans, die schon einen viel schlechteren Abend in der Allianzarena hatten ;)

title: Tolles Rundum-Erlebnis

Klar, hier wird fast food vom geschmack billigster qualitÃ¤tVerkauft. Es muss schnell gehen und beim FuÃŸball erwartet niemand irgendwelche GenÃ¼sse...auÃŸer bier.Ehrlich: Hauptsache Bayern spielt gut. Gastronomie ist letzrangig

De camino a Salzburgo nos desviamos en coche y no nos defraudÃ³ para nada, es mÃ¡s yo dirÃ­a que no habrÃ­a que perdersela. IncreÃ­ble. El tour aunque caro merece la pena. Pese a que lo vimos de dÃ­a y nos pareciÃ³ una maravilla, de noche y en dÃ­a de partido ni me lo imagino. Es para echarle unas cuantas horas pero de verdad que cumple todas las expectativas.

title: An excellent stadium
text: Our tour guide was Bernhard who was incredibly informative and helpful on our tour. The Arena is a must visit for the kombiticket which allows visits to the club museum and a guided tour for just 19 euros. The stadium is stunning both inside and out, and the access on the tour is excellent. The arena's lower tier can be visited, as well as Bayern's dressing room and backstage areas. One of the highlights of my stay in Munich!

TatsÃ¤chlich inakzeptabel ist die Abfahrt mit dem KFZ aus der Tiefgarage unter dem Stadion (eigene erlebte Wartezeit: 45 Minuten)!

title: Juste Waow
text: Le billet d'entrÃ©e est assez cher mais pour une personne (moi)  qui ne suis pas fan de foot du tout (alors la pas du tout) j'Ã©tais trÃ¨s impressionnÃ©e par le lieu, l'immensitÃ©.  MÃªme si le stade etait vide, l'atmosphÃ¨re etait tout autant rempli de ferveur.  La descente des marches est a vivre sans oublier la visite des vestiaires.

title: HERMOSA OBRA ARQUITECTÃ“NICA
text: Tomamos el metro para llegar estÃ¡ un poco retirado de la ciudad al llegar a la estaciÃ³n debes caminar un poco para llegar a la entrada, es una obra arquitectÃ³nica hermosa tan bien diseÃ±ada y agradable a la vista como una almohada blanca gigante

title: Obra de ingenieria en forma de estadio
text: Antes de irme de Munich queria visitar este estadio porque la gran mayoria de las personas me habian dicho que merecia la pena verlo por la noche iluminado.En mi caso, fui a visitarlo en dia de partido lo cual fue algo tedioso debido a la gran cantidad de personas y coches que van a ver el partido. Aunque los accesos y la organizacion del estadio es muy buena se dan grandes atascos tanto en las entradas como en las salidas del estadio.Si solo quereis visitar el estadio y no ver el partido o tour os recomiendo que intenteis aparcar en alguna zona alejada ya que el parking del estadio cuesta unos 10â‚¬ estes el tiempo que estes, la gente que va al partido aprovecha yendo un par de horas antes, aparca, se beben algunas cervezas en el propio parking y acceden al partido de futbol.Si teneis alguna duda de cualquier cosa no dudeis en preguntar a la policia o al personal de organizacion ya que son muy amables, respetuosos y si teneis suerte algunos hablan espaÃ±ol.

title: Allianz
text: Con il nostro camper ci siamo fermati per due notti sullâ€™area sosta che si trova nel parcheggio dello stadio, molto comodo in quanto a cinque minuti di camminata si trova la stazione per raggiungere facilmente il centro. Stadio molto suggestivo in particolare la sera con le luci che illuminano tutto.

title: Not amazing
text: The tour lasts a bit too much and for a cold day it isn't very pleasant. I don't recommend you to take the kids in a cold day.If i knew how it is, i would have taken only the museum entrance for 3 euros.Souvenirs shop too expensive.A restaurant is open if you get hungry between tours.

title: Schlauchboot
text: Schlauchboot und tote Hose da #S04Da ist in der Kreisliga sogar mehr Stimmung als in dem schlauchbootğŸ˜‚

title: Bayern gegen Schalke
text: Wir waren heute wie des Ã–fteren in der Allianz Arena zu einem Heimspiel des FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen. Wie immer ein tolles Erlebnis, gekrÃ¶nt von einem Heimsieg. Einen Besuch kann ich jedem nur empfehlen. Ebenso lohnenswert ist eine Stadiontour (diese ist auch fÃ¼r Personen im Rollstuhl oder anderen EinschrÃ¤nkungen mÃ¶glich) und natÃ¼rlich ein Besuch des Fan-Shops.

title: First Soccer/Futbol Match
text: Our family attended a FC Bayern match here and wow, it was just what we expected in terms of hype and noise and excitement!  Although we are Americans, attending a match in another country being surrounding by German speaking (or cheering) fans was an experience we'll never forget.  Bayern lost heavily, but it was so much fun to just be in the stadium.

title: EnttÃ¤uschend
text: Die Allianz Arena ist vom Aufbau her gedacht grundsÃ¤tzlich mal ein gutes Stadion. Leider hÃ¶rtâ€™s beim Gedanken schon auf. Die Logistik ist die mieseste aller Bundesligastadien, die ich bisher erlebt habe. Originalzitat zur zweiten Halbzeit â€wir haben keine Pommes mehrâ€œ bei einem ausverkauften Heimspiel ğŸ˜³ sorry, geht gar nicht. Auch sonst ist der Aufbau nur vom Innenraum her attraktiv (fÃ¼rs TV halt) aber wenn man mal dort war (mein 4. mal) ist es wiederholt unschÃ¶n fÃ¼r den Besucher an sich.

title: Tre anni di attesa inutili
text: Tornatoci a distanza di 3 anni in quanto non ero riuscito a fare il tour dello stadio questa volta mi sono premunito acquistando online il biglietto per il tour (19â‚¬) comprendente il museo. Quest'ultimo chiaramente ha visto la presenza di qualche trofeo in piÃ¹ rimanendo sempre molto affascinante. Mi ha invece molto deluso il tour vero e proprio dello stadio soprattutto se paragonati a tanti altri fatti: verrete portati e fatti sedere in curva per poi passare alla tribuna autoritÃ , da lÃ¬ verrete condotti alla sala stampa, agli spogliatoi del Bayern e a quelli avversari ed il vostro tour sarÃ  terminato. Non vi Ã¨ alcuna possibilitÃ  di fare il tunnel che conduce in campo, sedersi sulle panchine o fotografarsi a bordocampo. Insomma paragonato a San Siro, Bernabeu e Camp Nou mi sento di dire che Ã¨ stato molto deludente.

title: MÃ¼nchens wahre Liebe
text: Super Daniel, the Tour Guide. A very majestic arena with a superb Erlebniswelt. Combi Ticket price is normal. Fan shop prices and bistro prices a bit higher than they should. Allaround a 5 star experience.

title: Interessant
text: Die Tour war wirklich interessant und ist auch fÃ¼r Nicht-FuÃŸball-Fans empfehlenswert. Man kommt einfach in Bereiche, die man sonst nicht zu sehen bekommt und die Infos sind wirklich interessant.Unser Guide war nett, hat auf alle Fragen reagiert und stets eine Antwort gewusst.

title: FuÃŸball schauen
text: Top Stadion. Hier kann man gechillt vor dem Spiel im Paulaner Treff noch ein GetrÃ¤nk schlÃ¼rfen oder was essen. Wir sind immer sehr gern hier. Vorallem wenn der FCB gewinnt ğŸ¤­! Jeder sollte sich das Stadion anschauen wenn man in MÃ¼nchen ist. Es gibt auch gefÃ¼hrte RundgÃ¤nge hinter die Kulissen.

title: Fans de bayer
text: Tomamos un S desde MÃºnich centro y en pocos minutos estuvimos allÃ­, el predio inmenso donde desde lejos se divisaba el globo plateado del estadio allianz arena, emociÃ³n al triple! Varios otros visitantes, incluso familias y niÃ±os escaleras arriba accedimos al star donde adquirimos los tickets. El sitio de espera increÃ­ble, con espacios para comida y excelentes baÃ±os. Lugar acogedor con pantallas gigantes. Buen WiFi free. El museo increÃ­ble! La cancha estupendisima. Pero no tenÃ­an grabaciÃ³n guÃ­a en espaÃ±ol (sÃ³lo en alemÃ¡n e inglÃ©s). Recomendado visitar este lugar.

title: Espetacular
text: NÃ£o deixe de conhecer o estÃ¡dio Allianz Arena casa do Bayer de Munich, um passeio rÃ¡pido que agrada toda famÃ­lia, temDuas opÃ§Ãµes dentre vÃ¡rias:Conhecer o museu com toda histÃ³ria e fazer um tour guiado (temQue marcar horÃ¡rio) mas Ã© bemRÃ¡pido cerca de 1 hora...Vale a pena

title: Tempio del Bayern
text: Da non perdere se si Ã¨ appassionati di calcio, ma Ã¨ anche un magnifico esempio di architettura, sia di giorno che di notte, quando i pannelli di rivestimento si illuminano di rosso. E' possibile fare un tour combinato di stadio e museo, prezzo sui 20 euro circa.

title: Area sosta camper
text: Questa recensione Ã¨ riferita all'area sosta camper attrezzata che si trova presso il campo da calcio Allianz Arena. 15 euro al giorno x un camper con corrente inclusa carico e scarico acque. Fermata della metro linea blu che porta in centro. Ottima

title: Magnifico
text: Dall'esterno sembra un enorme astronave.La guida Ã¨ stata molto esaustiva, nonostante fosse in inglese soltanto! Bello il museo e lo store lo stadio all'interno vale davvero la visita!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mi piace questo stadio
text: Siamo andati qualche tempo fa a visitare l'Allianz Arena. Il museo all'interno Ã¨ grande Ã¨ racconta la storia dello stadio. Ci sono in vendita dei souvenir
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: gigantic stadium
text: a beautiful stadium and if you are a FC Bayern fan you will love it more. you can but the clubs souvniers here. ample parking and access to the subway.

title: Embora nÃ£o seja fÃ£ de futebol vale a pena a visita
text: Levei meu filho de 11 anos ao estÃ¡dio que adorou a visita. NÃ£o fizemos o tour mas foi possÃ­vel ir a loja que fica no primeiro piso do estÃ¡dio entÃ£o pode-se ver a estrutura interna e externa pagando apenas o estacionamento(atÃ© 45 min. nÃ£o Ã© cobrado(horÃ¡rios sem jogos). A loja Ã© muito legal e nÃ£o tem como sair de lÃ¡ sem comprar algo. Tendo oportunidade nÃ£o deixem de cisitar

title: Meraviglioso
text: Il tempio del bayern Monaco! Se siete amanti del calcio penso sia inutile dire quanto dovete assolutamente andare a visitarlo. Se riuscite prenotate online il tour, piÃ¹ veloce nella fase di ingresso.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great Visit to the Arena.  Not positive customer service
text: I visited the Arena and took the stadium tour with my Son as he was a FC Bayern fan.It was a great tour of the Roman style Gladiator Arena, and were brought to see the locker room, Press Conference Room in addition to the actual stadium itself.There are restaurants on site, as well as a Museum, and a big shop selling FC Bayern merchandise If youâ€™re planning to do the stadium tour and can plan the time in which you want to do it - consider booking the tickets online as the queue was very long when we were there on a Saturday morning.  But do be careful to book the tour in the right language.  I had incorrectly booked the German tour instead of an English one.  When I tried to change my tour on the day, I was chastised by at least 2 customer service employees!  I just had to apologise.  Do note that the tour does not seem accessible for people with mobility issues as we were climbing up and down stairs, and baby strollers were not allowed Also Budget sufficient time to walk from the metro station to the start point of the tour (we have no mobility issues and took at least 15 min)

title: Extraordinario
text: Hicimos el tourFuimos en tren hasta allÃ¡ y de camina duro hasta llegar al estadioEs un poco caro si, pero vale la pena, es el club mÃ¡s representativo y ganador de Alemania, asÃ­ que no se debe dejar de verAdentro la comida es carisma ok, pero es lÃ³gico, no hay nada de nada a kilÃ³metrosEl museo es sÃºper bueno y entras a las graderias pero no entras al cÃ©sped ni a las butacas de los jugadores10 puntos de 10 le doy a este estadio

title: Organizzazione?
text: Sicuramente un bellissimo stadio sia fuori che dentro, comodo da raggiungere con i mezzi pubblici. Per il resto non c'Ã¨ molto da dire i prezzi sono alti 20 euro per la visita e l'accesso al museo le indicazioni per poter trovare le casse sono inesistenti e se vi venisse voglia di bere dell'acqua evitate... una bottiglietta da mezzo litro 4 euro. Se decidete di visitare lo stadio durante l'ultimo orario di ingresso sappiate che l'uscita Ã¨ dalla parte opposta a quella da cui siete arrivati con i mezzi pubblici quindi vi ritroverete dispersi in mezzo al nulla e mettetevi l'anima in pace le indicazioni non esistono!!!

title: Bukan penggemar sepak bola pun akan senang
text: Pengalaman mengesankan mengunjungi salah satu stadion terbaik di eropa, tur dengan pemandu berbahasa inggris yang menyenangkan.

title: Allianz Arena
text: OdporÃºÄam zakÃºpiÅ¥ si prehliadku Å¡tadiÃ³na a nÃ¡vÅ¡tevu mÃºzea. Prehliadka je v nemeckom alebo anglickom jazyku. Je vhodnÃ© zakÃºpiÅ¥ si lÃ­stok online dopredu.

title: Immer einen Besuch Wert
text: Wer sich mal ein tolles Stadion anschauen mÃ¶chte ist hier richtig. Die Stimmung ist ja bekanntlich nicht die tollste. Deshalb gibt es einen Punkt Abzug.Die Erreichbarkeit aus der Stadt ist simpel.

title: Impressionnant!
text: 75 000 personnes dans un stade de foot, câ€™est une ambiance Ã  vivre au moins une fois dans sa vie qui plus est, lâ€™architecture est impressionnante tout comme lâ€™organisation millimÃ©trÃ©e.Il faut nÃ©anmoins respecter certaines petites rÃ¨gles : pas de grand sac main sous peine de faire se voir refouler et de devoir faire la queue Ã  la consigne bagages ... idem pour les chargeurs externes.Il faut Ã©galement sâ€™armer de patience pour le retour en mÃ©tro .... nous avons finalement choisi lâ€™option â€œretour en marchantâ€.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: E c c e l l e n t e
text: T O P, mai visto uno stadio piÃ¹ bello di questo Ã¨ devo dire che ne ho visti svariati compreso il Santiago Bernabeo. Facile da raggiungere posti a pagamento al prezzo di euro 5,00â‚¬ pulito curato e ben organizzato, per nn parlare del museo allâ€™interno. Complimenti tappa per chi si reca a Monaco, ne vale la pena.

title: Soccer Game
text: Wonderful place to view a soccer game.  Facility is very organized and easy to get in and out!  A bit of a walk from the subway, but well worth the walk.

title: Senza fiato
text: Siamo andati al tramonto...non cambiava colore in quanto era come un pacco regalo...rosso con fiocco giallo. Bellissimo cmq.

title: Espectacular
text: Nos recomendaron hacer una visita al estadio Allianz Arena al anochecer, y realmente vale la pena ya que se ve todo iluminado y cambiando de color.Pudimos entrar a la tienda donde puedes comprar articulos de todo tipo con el anagrama del club y a la vez pudimos ver un trozo del campo.

title: Am Abend wunderschÃ¶n beleuchtet
text: Definitiv immer ein tolles Fotomotiv am Abend und es lohnt sich definitiv auch unabhÃ¤ngig von einem FuÃŸballspiel vorbeizuschauen. Gerade wenn es dunkel ist. An jedem Advent ist die Arena auÃŸerdem als Schleife beleuchtet. Sieht echt toll aus.

title: Gran ambiente en el estadio
text: Si van un dÃ­a de partido recomiendo llegar 4 horas antes para tener tiempo de visitar el museo (se paga) , ademas de visitar la tienda y tener un refrigerio. En tren se puede llegar sin ningÃºn problema. Si solo vas a ver el partido el estadio lo abren 2 horas antes. Bonita experiencia para los que nos gusta el fÃºtbol.

title: Tolles Stadium, Probleme bei der Sitzplatzsuche
text: Wir waren zu ersten Mal im der Allianz Arena und es hat uns fÃ¼r gefallen.Beim Einlass mÃ¼ssen sich Frauen separat anstellen, wodurch es zu lÃ¤ngeren Wartezeiten kam. Als mÃ¼ssten wir nicht auch schon auf den Toiletten immer lÃ¤nger anstehen und hÃ¤tten dadurch genug Geduld gelernt, um auch hier extra lange zu stehen ğŸ˜… Wir mussten leider ein wenig laufen, um unsere PlÃ¤tze zu finden, aber das lag bestimmt auch an uns.Wir haben LeberkÃ¤se gegessen, auf den Becher Cola gab es Pfand und,sicher bedingt durch die Weihnachtszeit, hatten wir auch GlÃ¼hwein, der sehr lecker war.Kurz vor Anpfiff eine Toilette aufzusuchen war wiederum sehr schwer, da die Herren- und Damentoiletten nicht nebeneinander liegen. Aber die lange Wartezeit und das suchen nach Toiletten ist wohl in den meisten Stadien ein Problem. Sie waren zudem sauber.Die An- und Abreise war mit der U-Bahn und eigentlich einfach und bequem, aber der FuÃŸweg von der Bahnstation bis zum Stadion hat sich leider gezogen und war, bedingt durch das Wetter, auch ziemlich kalt.Wer mit dem Auto anreist muss mit folgenden ParkgebÃ¼hren rechnen: an Spieltagen 15â‚¬, sonst 5â‚¬ pro Tag.

title: Un po' una delusione
text: Ero arrivato carico di aspettative e sono rimasto un po' deluso. Bello il museo della squadra con tutta la storia del Bayer. Vedi tutti i trofei vinti con particolari interessanti. Ma quando chiedi di completare il giro con la visita agli spogliatoi ed altri ambienti le visite sono quasi tutte in tedesco. Per quella in inglese bisognava aspettare oltre due ore, erano le 11,  ed abbiamo dovuto rinunciare. Un peccato.

title: La magie du foot
text: Stade grandiose !!! Ambiance respectueuse entre les fans. Lieu magique.... Il faut absolument voir un match dans ce stade ! Parking  souterrain pour 10 euros lors de match.

title: GREATEST STADIUM EVER
text: One of the best experiences of my life.  Starting with a gigantic and easy oriented parking lot with 10.000 spots, easy access thru public transportation too, an awesome museum of the Bayern Munich soccer team.  Excellent food, specially the one we tried on the Bistro restaurant. Lots of vendors inside on home match days like the one we experienced, you can try authentic german food as well as dishes like pizza and wraps.  By the way the beer is out of this world

text: Si sa che da queste parti si paga pure l aria che si respira.. ma 3 bambini 27â‚¬ anche no! Visto che un adulto paga circa 20â‚¬.. poi di giorno da fuori tanto bello non e'!!

title: Nothing to see here
text: Unless you come to watch a game, or to purchase some FC Bayern munchen stuff, there is nothing to see here. If you have limited time in Munich, skip this, as this is also located quite far from the city.

title: super
text: immer einen besuch wert - allein die "erlebniswelt", eine art fc bayern-museum , ausserdem jede menge gastronomie, und eine fÃ¼hrung mitmachen lohnt sich auch

title: A great experience as a football fan
text: Match was disappointing as an away supporter, but everything else was good. Slightly awkward to get to, quite a long way out of city centre. Loved the atmosphere, lighting, interactive banter between the public announcer + the crowd after each goal

title: Nice ground but nothing special
text: Went there as a visiting fan with Tottenham.No beer or stalls allowed because of our visit.Stuck up in the Gods and about two million flights of stairs to climb.Atmosphere in the ground was ok.Away fans kept in for ages so now understand why people left early.It is a nice place but preferred the old Olympic Stadium

title: Visitew o museu de um dos maiores times de futebol da histÃ³ria
text: A visita ao museu da Allianz Arena vale muito a pena. Ã‰ possÃ­vel ver os principais trofÃ©us e jogadores do famoso time da bavÃ¡ria. Vale muito a pena.

title: Stadium visit
text: This was an excellent tour, so much history and tradition with this club. Facilities were breath taking.The young tour guide was really interesting and so helpful to the group which was made up of different nationalities.Would highly recommend this tour and the young male guide.

title: Great stadium and tour
text: We visited here on my birthday and took part in the tour with Herbert. He was a great tour guide, very knowledgable and had a great sense of humour. The museum is excellent, nice to see the history of the team. Best part is definitely the tunnel. Would definitely recommend visiting if in Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: FCBBVB
text: Bayern 4 dortmund nail!!!I am so lucky to be there witness match! The business seats are incredible you can see everything thatâ€™s going on on the field can you get top chef to cook for you all night

title: Great work!
text: A giant stately building that attracts millions of tourists from all over the world.Tour price per person is 19 euros,in group it is 17 euros.You can see Vip areas,media seating (approximately 300 seats),camera positions,the pitch,press conference room and team area.A very special tour.

title: A VISIT
text: Allianz Arena is incredible what a place they have shows on and entertainment on there is a cafe and refreshments and bar a great place to visit

title: For soccer and non soccer fans
text: A guided tour is worth the trip here .Itâ€™s a very informative tour not only about the stadium but also about the FuÃŸball Verein  ( soccer teams ) and Munichâ€˜s success in the FuÃŸball world .

title: Not a football fan but ....
text: Neither of us is a big football fan. However, we decided to visit either Alliance Arena or Camp Nou on this trip as we have always passed by football stadiums in other countries and have never visited one. Alliance Arena is easily reachable by metro and there were tours in either English or German. The tour itself was very good and lasts about an hour and we got to see behind the scenes of a football stadium. To see it live is quite different as compared on TV and the football fans in our group were more than happy. The ticket also included entrance to the nearby museum where it was interesting to learn about the Bayern Munich Football Club. The different cups on display were also impressive . The store was our last stop where our teenage boy could buy some souvenirs back home.

title: I enjoy this soccer stadium.
text: It's a best place to visit if you are Munich,i love football my support to Germany team.It is worth a visit this student and Museum.

title: Brilliant....eye opening

title: A Must See for Futball/Soccer Fans
text: Impressive stadium and a must see for futball/soccer fans. Easy to get to from Munchen City Centre. Just take the U6 and get off at the Frottmaning stop. It will be a good 15 minute walk from there, but you can't lose your way. The tour takes place on the other side of the stadium.

title: Great tour!
text: Great tour of the statium but you don't get to go on the pitch at all. It is a nice stadium seeing the real change rooms and other areas of the stadium. We also got to see the museum also which had some amazing things.

title: Great visit. The best stadium i have visited
text: The stadium is huge. It has its own museum inside and they also offer guided tours. The tour was great but you have to walk and go up the stairs many time so make sure you wear confortable shoes.

title: Andateci verso sera.
text: Non ci interessava visitare il museo del Bayern, ma vedere lo stadio da fuori. Siamo arrivati verso l'imbrunire la stadio avveniristico era ancora spento e di colore bianco ( tipo ciambellone Michelin) , poi si sono accese le luci rosse , il colore del BAYERN, veramente bello. CI arrivi con la U Bahn e sei ancora all'interno delle 4 zone considerate Interne. Bello.

title: Donâ€™t miss Allianz Arena
text: Such a cool place!  It was a ways off from most other attractions, but we were able to Uber there easily and then take the train back to Marienplatz (thereâ€™s a U-Bahn train station that specifically serves the stadium). We were there during the day, which was an awesome sight. Only wish we could have stayed into the night to see it beautifully lit up. We didnâ€™t have time for the tour, but from the pictures we saw, it would have been well worth it. Instead we went to their superstore inside the stadium and thoroughly enjoyed shopping there. My wife, my daughter and I all found things we liked and we werenâ€™t even FC Bayern fans. Now we are!

title: Tour
text: Really enjoyed the tour of the Allianz arena. Andrea our guide was very informative. I am not really a football fan however enjoyed the tour. Would definetly recommend going if you come to Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Passione per il Bayer
text: Essendo un tifoso del Bayer ritrovarsi davanti all enorme stadio Allianz fa un certo effetto,di sera cambia colore a volte lo si trova in blu/in prossimitÃ  di partite importanti color rosso

title: Great Stadium to See A Soccer/Football Match
text: Great sightlines from anywhere in the stadium.  Easy access from downtown Munich to the train on the train.

title: Great guide
text: A fantastic tour! Christina was full of knowledge and a very enthusiastic tour guide. One of the best stadium tours we have been on. Only down side (nothing to do with our fabulous guide!!) was that the gift shop is incredibly expensive! To any families coming here ; pick your favorite child before you come because unless you have several hundred euro to spare you will not be able to afford more than one jersey!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Visit to one of the best football stadium
text: The architectural beauty of the stadium can be seen from long distance, shaped like a bagel or a burger. The inside was fantastic with very good seating arrangements, artificial grass well maintained by applying lights and lasers, very good press rooms and player dressing rooms. The cafeteria was also very good with good Paulaner beer and German food. The arena also has a fantastic museum where most of the silvers won by the club over many decades are kept. The fan shop was quite big with lots of choice. Finally as a FCB fan this was like home coming for me. Mia San Mia
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

text: Great atmosphere, easy access in/out of arena. Lots of fan loyalty, cheering, fanfare, all seats have great views rain or shine.

title: A must for any footy fan
text: Wow...what a stadium and a great museum too. The tour is very good and certainly worth while. There is a great food hall and bar too. Just dont mention Sadio Mane's goal in the 2019 champions league last year!

title: Passing by the Allianz Arena.
text: On our trip throughout Germany with a coach we also passed by the â€œAllianz Arenaâ€ in Munique, this footbal stadium was inaugurated in the month of April 2005, and is the official stadium of Munique. Before the renovatrion of the year 2015 the capacity of the Arena was up to 71.000 spectators. But as the Arena got his renovation in the year 2015 this in order to change the law and expand his capacity until 75.000 spectators. The stadium is open all year round as all seven levels include shopping centers. In addition, the complex also has an ecological park. A FC Bayern museum and shop are also open in the building.

text: Con mio figlio di 11 anni ormai si scelgono le mete in base agli stadi da visitare... questo Ã¨ davvero il piÃ¹ bello mai visto!! Dallâ€™esterno la struttura Ã¨ davvero maestosa, Interessante il museo, Store ricco e completo. Tour scaglionato e sempre guidato, davvero ben fatto con guida molto esaustiva che rispondeva a tutte le curiositÃ  e domande. Comodo tutti i parcheggi intorno, facilmente raggiungibile anche con i mezzi. Prezzo nella media. Consiglio una visita.

title: Magnifique stade
text: Le stade est vraiment magnifique de lâ€™extÃ©rieur comme Ã  lâ€™intÃ©rieur. Le tour combinÃ© Ã  la visite du musÃ©e est certes un peu onÃ©reuse mais vaut le coup dâ€™Ãªtre faite au moins une fois.Le musÃ©e est trÃ¨s bien fait , chargÃ© dâ€™histoire et il yâ€™a pas mal dâ€™activitÃ©s pour les enfants
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Inspirational stadium
text: My first visit to the Allianz and being a football fan i was looking forward to it. Easy to get to, although we did visit when there was no match on, 10-15 minute walk from the U-Bahn. Looks amazing when you're walking up to it, bet it's magnificent at night when lit up. For a non-match day there was quite a few people milling around, waiting to do the tour, museum and shop like us. They stagger the tours depending on the language group and how many so we had a 2 hour wait for ours but after visiting the museum, a great visit and learning experience with so many iconic matches and players and then visiting the shop it only left us half hour for a quick bite to eat in the canteen then on to the tour.The guide was excellent, spoke great english and was informative and fun. Takes around 45 mins if i remember rightly and you get to visit the must see's. Stadium is fantastic and caters really well for the fans, something a few clubs back here could learn from regardless of size and league.The only thing it left me was wanting to experience a match day. Maybe next year. Quite reasonably priced all 3 of thought as well. A bit like their match ticket prices.

title: A bit of a walk from public transportation however worth the time.
text: F.C. Bayern Munich Is an iconic football club. Most fittingly the stadium they play in is absolutely gorgeous and not just architecturally. Take the stadium tour, visit the museum, and of course you need to hit to gift shop on the way out. Even if you are not a Bayern Munich  supporter, if you are a football lover it is impossible not to be impressed and overwhelmed with the majesty of the stadium itself as well as the museum.

title: Lindo EstÃ¡dio
text: Fiquei encantada com esse EstÃ¡dio.  Por fora, me lembrar o formato do pneu de um carro.  Fui durante o dia.  Dizem que Ã  noite iluminando Ã© lindÃ­ssimo.  NÃ£o fizemos visita guiada.  Dentro tem uma boutique com vÃ¡rios produtos  do Bayern. Valeu demais.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: SchÃ¶nes Stadion, tolle Tour, ABER Preise, Parken und der GÃ¤steblock absolute Katastrophe
text: Die Preise sind extrem teuer und das Parken ist eine absolute Katastrophe: Kennzeichenerkennung bei Ausfahrt anstatt Zahlen bei Einfahrt ... Man kann eh nur Tagespass fÃ¼r 10â‚¬ wÃ¤hlen.Im ganzen Parkhaus (P3) gab es EINEN Automaten zum zahlen, so dass wir um 10:00 am Spieltag (15:30 Uhr) schon 15 Minuten Schlangestehen mussten. Einzige Orientierungshilfe im Parkhaus waren farbliche Markierungen der Ebene! In unserem Fall war das weiss auf grauem Beton, wobei man zunÃ¤chst nicht erkennen konnte, dass das dann die Ebene kennzeichnen sollte. Hinweisschilder waren beim Bau der ParkhÃ¤user offensichtlich noch nicht erfunden. Mangels fehlender Hinweise haben wir diesen Farbcode erst auf der Ebene 3 (grÃ¼n) in der Schlange am einzigen Kassenautomaten bemerkt. Da wussten wir unsere Farbe aber nicht mehr, was zur Folge hatte, dass wir unser Auto 30 Minuten auf den falschen Ebenen gesucht haben. Die Angestellten (Durchwinker) im Parkhaus waren auch keine grosse Hilfe, da sie kaum der deutschen Sprache mÃ¤chtig waren und auch keine Ortskenntnisse hatten. Der einzige Kassenautomat hat meinen 10â‚¬-Schein auch schÃ¶n angenommen und verschluckt ... danach gemeldet, dass der Vorgang abgebrochen wurde, so dass ich erneut (diesmal mit EC-Karte) zahlen musste! Danke lieber FC Bayern. Ebenso mÃ¶chte ich mich auch ganz herzlich fÃ¼r die Unterbringung der GÃ¤stefans ganz oben unter dem Dach, zusammen mit den grenzdebilen, vollgesoffenen Fahnenschwenkern und KinderliedergrÃ¶lern bedanken! Unsere Familie (3 Kinder: 10, 8 und 4  Jahre) haben Nullkommanix vom Spiel mitbekommen, dafÃ¼r 45â‚¬ Eintritt bezahlt (keine KinderermÃ¤ssigung!!!) und horrende Preise fÃ¼r mittelprÃ¤chtige Lebensmittel-QualitÃ¤t und -QuantitÃ¤t (Pizza 15 cm Durchmesser etc) gezahlt ...  also einen unvergesslichen Tag erlebt, den wir in der Allianz-Arena niemals mehr wiederholen werden!

title: Cooler Besuch (nur das spiel...)
text: Die Arena hat sich gut entwickelt.Stimmung ist besserAmbiente noch attraktiverDas catering, die Sicht auf das spiel sind gewohnt gut.Die Abreise mit U-Bahn kÃ¶nnte verbessert werden, der mvv kÃ¶nnte da sicher was tunFÃ¼r das unterdurchschnittliche spiel kann ja die arena nix... ;)
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wow! What an amazing stadium. That's all I have!
text: Defiantly purchase the combo ticket to see the FC Bayern Museum as well. As part of that you will get a guided tour of the arena. The tour itself is fantastic. The guides were amazing and very witty. Even for none fans it is totally worth it. The tour will take you all over the arena, from the stands, to the grounds, the restaurants, and even the players dressing rooms. It is both interactive and informative. Plus it is just an amazing stadium. Try to see it at night as well. Its worth it. A must do while in Munich and make sure to the Museum combo ticket as well!

title: Amazing atmosfare
text: Saw FC Bayern lost against Hoffenheim. The arena was magnaficent. The fans were loud and created a wall of sound. Check it out!

title: Octoberfest
text: Assolutamente da vedere noi abbiamo fatto il giro con la guida, pranzo, museo, shopping giocato nel mini campo di calcetto adatto anche per bambini

title: Die Arena. Auch fÃ¼r nicht FC BAYERN Fans eine Pflicht
text: Geniale Konstruktion. Super susgeschildert,sehr vielseitig und immer einen Besuch wert.So kann Stadionbau auch sein. Zeitlos immer modern. Infrastuktur und Ã¶ffentlicher Personennahverkehr vorbildlich

title: What a beauty to see at night
text: I went to see the stadium at dusk and the tours were already over. I was amazed by the beautiful red color as I got closer and closer. There were still a lot of people hanging around as well, but this stadium looking from the outside is a beauty.

title: Luxury football stadium
text: A very attractive and luxury football stadium belongs to Bayern Munich team in Munich. A large and nice museum and sportswear shop located there also. I recomend it to everyone who visits Munich.

text: Stadio bellissimo sia esternamente che internamente,  bellissimo anche il tour all'interno dello stadio. Si puÃ² visitare il campo, spogliatoi, museo.Una bella esperienza per chi ama il calcio come me

title: Muito interessante!
text: O estÃ¡dio Ã© moderno e possui uma visita guiada bem organizada que mostra os principais pontos do estÃ¡dio e sua histÃ³ria. Vale conhecÃª-lo, embora fique distante do centro de Munique.

title: Great tour with Sajad
text: Landed in Munich from Australia and decided to do the stadium tour. 19 euro for the tour and museum was great value. Sajad led our tour and he knew so much about the club, the history and was both passionate and amusing in delivery. He made the tour great and we loved it. Saw arena, dressing rooms, playerâ€™s tunnel and gym. Easy train trip from town. Great tour, lots of photo opportunities. Great couple of hours. Thanks Sajad.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Estadio grandioso
text: Es un estadio precioso y tiene buen acceso. Nos saliÃ³ el parking gratis. No es necesario hacer el tour ya que puedes acceder a casi todo menos a las gradas. Tiene una tienda fantÃ¡stica y se puede comer tambiÃ©n ahÃ­

title: Amazing stadium
text: Bayern's stadium is probably one of the best in the world. Easy reachable by metro, fast ticket and security control, many food and beverage options in the stadium, free wi-fi, good seating, stands are close to the pitch and it's very acoustic.

title: War mit einer Reisegruppe einer Delegation von Sri Lanka unterwegs
text: War hier mit einer Reisegruppe besser gesagt einer Delegation von Sri Lanka unterwegs und haben hier die Allianz Arena besucht die FÃ¼hrung war sehr gut und wurde vieles gezeigt in Englisch natÃ¼rlich gerne komme ich wieder Wir konnten Dinge sehen wo man als normale ohne eine FÃ¼hrung nicht sehen kann die Leute aus Sri Lanka waren alle begeistert

title: The Stadium for Bayern Munich. Was good tour with kids.
text: We have been there in February. We just land to Munich airport, rent a car and visit there because my sons are fan of Bayern Munich:) it was very nice tour with the guide. You can check the tour times before you visit. The guides and staff was very good in stadium. We spent around 2 hours with kids also there is museum for Bayern Munich fottball team in Stadium.

title: Da vedere, ma...
text: Ero piuttosto incuriosito, arrivati scendendo dalla metropolitana la struttura Ã¨ davvero maestosa e bellissima. Arrivati sotto lo stadio non si capisce immediatamente dove andare. Volevo accedere in qualche modo per vedere il rettangolo verde, ma bisogna pagare il tour (un po meno di 20 euro). Visto che non avevo particolare interesse per la storia della squadra di Monaco ho rinunciato.

text: I've been to stadia across Europe and this was up there with the best atmosphere I've experienced. I will be back

title: Great when the lights turn on
text: My son wanted to visit this at night, so we waited 40mins until dusk, and then it lit up, red, we also had a great sunset to watch and it was very peaceful, worth the wait...

title: Great!
text: One of the best stadiums. Huge. We got to pay for the tour and it was really great. The guide explained everything about its history and the way it was built to be protected by the weather conditions. He showed us all the interesting places inside, however we were very disappointed about not being allowed to enter the field and take pictures there - after all we paid a quite expensive fee for such a short time and not even seeing eveything.

title: Eh un posto molto bello interessante

title: Eines der schÃ¶nsten Stadien
text: Nicht nur fÃ¼r Bayern Fans ein schÃ¶nes Ausflugsziel abseits der Spieltage. Sowohl die Arena Tour ist lohnenswert als auch besonders das Vereinsmuseum welches ebenfalls zu den schÃ¶nsten in Deutschland gehÃ¶rt.

title: Tappa obbligatoria per chi ama il calcio
text: Brividi sulla pelle ...entrare nel tempio del calcio non Ã¨ da tutti i giorni!! Il museo Ã¨ uno spettacolo a cielo aperto, trofei internazionali e non solo ...il Bayern Monaco Ã¨ davvero spettacolare anche per chi non Ã¨ tifoso. Disposto molto bene, ci si perde perchÃ¨ non si vuole tralasciare la vista di nessun trofeo e nessuna immagine. Personale affabile e disponibile, purtroppo solo un cassiere parla italiano. Peccato che abbiamo fatto la visita guidata in inglese ma era l'unica disponibile. Lo stadio Ã¨ veramente bellissimo. Il prezzo non Ã¨ proprio alla mano, si paga 19â‚¬ ad entrare per visitare il museo+giro dello stadio. La gente va lo stesso ma abbassando il prezzo del biglietto ci sarebbero a mio avviso molti piÃ¹ ingressi

title: Good stadium to visit
text: Had Leon as our tour guide, staff were really helpful with booking and more than happy to help out with any issues. Leon was very informative and led the group well- we saw all the areas you would expect (changing rooms, press room, stands) but the players tunnel was out of service which was disappointing. We also didnâ€™t get to sit at the press conference desk for photos which is more than easy to do and is offered at other premier stadia in Europe. The tour route was a little short for my liking and Iâ€™d have a bit more time in the stadium itself if possible but on a guided tour this is to be expected. An improvement would be to go in some hospitality areas and have some more time for questions but overall was impressive as a stadium and very informative. The Combi Ticket let us into the museum as well which almost has too much info but thatâ€™s good to cater to varying interest levels, although the layout could be better to make sure you donâ€™t miss some things

title: Bella esperienza
text: Tour dello stadio e visita del museo per 19 Euro. Un po' sbrigativa la visita forse si potrebbe migliorare inserendo la visita a bordo campo e qualche informazione supplementare durante il tour negli spogliatoi. Nel complesso comunque la visita mi sento di consigliarla

title: Una navicella spaziale
text: Esternamente sembra un UFO, internamente Ã¨ splendido e perfettamente adatto a vedere la partita in maniera impeccabile da ogni posto a sedere.19 euro la visita completa: tour stadio + museo.Molto interessante la visita alle tribune da diverse angolature, non mi ha entusiasmato particolarmente la visita agli spogliatoi, le sale massaggi e i ristoranti interni.Il museo Ã¨ impressionante e da l'idea della grandezza di questo club mitico.Alla fine c'Ã¨ anche un enorme shop dove ho visto gente far man bassa di oggetti e maglie della squadra bavarese, con i prezzi dei prodotti medio alti.La metro comodissima lascia a qualche centinaio di metri dalla struttura.

title: Allianz Arena, Tour y Estadio.
text: El estadio por estructura es increÃ­ble, pero el tour es deficiente, no se puede bajar a nivel de la cancha, cuando otros estadios del mismo nivel lo permiten, siempre te mantienen a nivel de las graderÃ­as. De la salida del metro al estadio hay que caminar casi un kilÃ³metro y en el estadio hay que subir bastantes gradas por lo cual hay que ir preparado.

title: Bello stadio

Il primo giorno siamo arrivati alle 18 tutto chiuso , il giorno dopo sani arrivati per tempo , per mangiare un paio di bar ristoranti dai prezzi esagerati , l'unico negozio Ã¨ lo store della squadra   carina la visita allo stadio anche se abbiamo dovuto aspettare un ora  per il giro con la guida  accesso agli spogliatoi , alle tribune e ingresso del campo. El estadio es muy moderno y muy bonito, entramos en la tienda (todo muy caro) y nos dimos una vuelta para intentar hacer fotos. Recomendable para aficionados al fÃºtbol.

title: Amazing
text: This is the best football stadium I have ever visited. Great atmosphere. Travel to/from by rail was crowded but it never felt as though we were amongst tens of thousands. Very strict bag size policy but there is somewhere to leave your stuff. Also, payment for refreshments only contactless or using prepaid card. (Pretty good football team too!)

title: Imponente
text: Splendido stadio del Bayern sopratutto alla sera quando si illumina di colori diversi.Facilmente raggiungibile con la metropolitana.

title: Nella norma
text: Stadio posizionato fuori Monaco, abbiamo fatto la visita allo stesso e al museo. Le visite sono disponibili solo in tedesco e inglese.. per il museo ci sono delle audio guide in italiano. Lo stadio dista quasi 1km dalla stazione della metropolitana, quindi non comodissimo. Per restare senza parole, va visto alla sera tutto illuminato.LÃ¬ si percepisce la vera emozione di quello che Ã¨ questa struttura.

title: Lights not open very late
text: We went there about 10.30pm. Even though it says on some websites that the lights are on upto three hours after sunset; this depends on the weather.  Its worth checking their webcam which is available on their website and updated every 10 seconds. Otherwise a good arena; would have liked to see it in the day.

title: Tour normal/caro

title: Beautiful Stadium
text: We took the stadium tour in English at 11:45 am on Monday morning. Itâ€™s very easy to get to the stadium using the UBahn and a bit of a walk. The Stadium Station is handily marked on the map with a football so you canâ€™t make a mistake!It was a great tour of the stands plus behind the scenes. The guide was very knowledgable and helpful. They have a big shop where you can be relieved of lots of cash for everything you could possibly want as a Bayern fan! The museum proudly displays the silverware plus the full history of the club. There was a pleasant cafe too.

title: Both good and bad
text: As an event it was very good and a lot of the staff were helpful, we arrived at the stadium quite early and the idea was to walk around the stadium have a few drinks and something to eat, unfortunately the Stadium is in an industrial district with not a lot around it, they were however starting to set up beer and food stalls, but I guess there must of been some sort legislation that prevented them from opening until 2pm, we asked where we could get a drink and something to eat..... now this is where the bad part comes in, the ONLY food in the whole place was inside the stadium museum, yes you guessed it we had to pay â‚¬12 each, it was so hot that we didnâ€™t really have a lot of choice but to pay the money and made a B-line for the very small counter, we were told if we wanted hot food then there was a bistro on the way out of the museum, now the Allianz stadium operates a cashless program which a lot of stadia do now but what they make you do here is to by a card that works nowhere else but the stadium and you use your credit card to put money on that, we purchased 2 small pizzas and 2 soft drinks for nearly â‚¬30 from 2 elder staff members who could not of hated the English more and probably took all their strength just to serve us.So in summary the Audi Cup experience was excellent 4 sets of fans had a great time once the fan zones were finally open, if youâ€™re going early pack some food and drinks (you probably canâ€™t take it inside the stadium though)

title: Home of Bayern
text: Despite their status as one of the true heavyweights of European football, Bayern Munich lacked an iconic stadium until 2005 when the Allianz Arena opened its doors. Built in time for the 2006 World Cup, the Arena was designed to give Bavaria a sporting temple to be proud of. Seating 71,000 spectators, and famous for selling out most matches before the season even begins, the first battle you may face when trying to see Bayern's home first-hand is the one of picking up a ticket. Personally I was tactical in my approach, opting to go for a midweek cup game against lower-league Heidenheim, the week after a Champions League tie and days before a practical league-decider against Borussia Dortmund. While this mean I could be a ticket first-hand (through Bayern's excellent online service) I was still pleasantly surprised by the crowd they drew in for such a tie (admittedly, due to Germany's lax laws on segregation, a lot of Heidenheim fans had made the relatively short journey too) If you are trying to gain tickets for a game that appears sold out don't fret. Bayern do offer an official secondary market service on their website, and tickets are usually avaialble either on the day via touts outside or on secondary selling site Viagogo. The risk with these is paying inflated rates, but I guess that comes entirely down to how much you're willing to pay. On the subject of ticket prices, I do think it is important to address one of the almost buzzwords of German football and shatter some notions; while it is true that tickets start at â‚¬15 for the standing section, don't expect to get your hands on one of them - they go first, to your actual fans, rightly so. You'll be paying around Â£25-35 face value for one of the tickets, which, when you take into account at one stage recently it has cost Â£27 to see Rangers v Albion Rovers, isn't really bad at all, and is what I'd class as the norm. Getting to the stadium is a fairly simple task; Despite being well out with the city itself, the Allianz is serviced by a Metro stop which is followed by around a 10 minute walk. No complaints here. As with most Continental stadiums, your ticket first gains you entrance to a gated off concourse outside the actual structure itself, where you can buy food, visit the Bayern Megastore or just bask in the majesty of the place. It is worth noting that while there are Official Bayern merchandise booths outside the concourse, there are surprisingly view unofficial merchants (1 as you come off the Metro) so don't expect any cheaper scarves or merch! As you'd expect pints are served inside the stadium, so that's one of the hallowed selling points of German football definitely true! Also worth taking stock of is not to jump the gun and get food from the lower level food stalls, which offer a fairly sparse selection compared to what is available once you actually enter the ground. On the subject of the actual stadium itself, the Allianz is a wonderful blend of contemporary design and traditional 'feel'. It's plastic, light-up, colour changing exterior is what it's best known for (and don't try pretend it isn't cool) but once you actually venture up the stairs you find yourself in a theatre built for watching football: great views, and an even better atmosphere generated by Bayern's support, which is easier said than done given the high amount of tourists who earmark this as a must see. I realise the hypocrisy there but I do at least try to join in language permitting! I'm usually loathe to rate a stadium's atmosphere based upon one game, but watching Bayern play a 2nd tier outfit in a cup game a week removed from a Champions League exit actually told me a lot: Their fans are fantastic. Genuinely. Lively, loud and above all else fun, it's hard to fault the atmosphere they generated (big shout out to the Heidenheim support too on that front) and it does nothing but whet the appetite to visit on a Champions League or big Bundesliga date. Sadly I wasn't in Munich long enough to take in the tour, but I am assured it covers all the necessary bases. I couldn't recommend a trip to the Allianz to any football fan enough. Gorgeous stadium, great crowd and generally everything I look for in a day at the game. As I say you might need to pay slightly over the odds to gain a ticket, but I've heard tickets to an English Premier League game can start at Â£50 a head, so I suppose realistically how much you pay comes down to personal circumstance. I'd definitely go back, and wouldn't mind paying slightly over the odds because I know how good it is.

title: Munchen ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª
text: During my Family Journey in Munich, I visited a lot of places with monuments and restaurants. If you have time, I kindly suggest you to visit this stadium.

title: Extra
text: Superbe visite !! Stade extraordinaire !! Notre ado a adorÃ©. Visite des gradins des vestiaires salle de presse salle de sport  etc...

title: ImperdÃ­vel
text: Para quem gosta de esportes e futebol. VÃ¡ de metrÃ´. Caminhe bastante. FaÃ§a compra  antecipada de ingressos e fava o tour completo. Vale a pena.

title: Flot men dyrt
text: Flot og imponerende. Men alt for dyrt at komme ind og se og det er kun pÃ¥ guidede ture. Har set andre store stadions hvor det er muligt at gÃ¥ en specifik tur rundt alene, hvilket passer bedre for os.

title: FCB
text: Als kein Fussbaldfan hab ich ein schÃ¶ne Erlebnis erlebt. Riesiger Stadion, perfekter Stimmung. FÃ¼r den Preis was ich ingesamt ausgegeben hab konnte ich mehrere SehenswÃ¼rdigkeiten und ein Restaurant in MÃ¼nchen leisten.

title: Bayern
text: Le stage etait grave cleanax et le guide Ã©tait un bon shegey. Par contre titou aime pas muller(cf photo)

title: Home of the great FC Bayern!
text: the home stadium of the great FC Bayern - visit it -the tour is great and the stadium is very modern and nice. Be sure to visit the FCB muesem as well - a great fun for men and children!

title: FCB
text: Als Bayern Fan ist es da echt jedes Mal toll. Ob nur Stadionrundgang oder zum Spiel. Eines der schÃ¶nsten Stadien der Welt

title: Great stadium tour
text: Great guided tour of the stadium, covers the stadium, media area, changing rooms, and tunnel to the field. Guides are very good. The museum is informative and has lots of interactive panels and trophies.

title: Pick your visit day wisely
text: We were very disappointed in our visit. The reason being was that the tour we went on, was only a half tour. We only were able to sit in dome seats and look into the stadium. No locker room, no field, no owners box, no vip area which is very common on most stadium tours throughout the world. We only learned once we were already on the tour that we would not be getting a full tour, not even when we purchased them at the arena. We had two guides for our limited tour, who each gave differing reasons as to why tours that day were only getting a 1/2 tour. The guides were very knowledgeable on the building, history & content though. There was nothing on their website prior to, or on the day of, to indicate there wouldnâ€™t be a full tour. My son was SUPER disappointed as he plays for a Bayern MÃ¼nchen affiliated club.

title: Lavori di manutenzione
text: Ci siamo andati nel tardo pomeriggio ed eravamo pochi turisti. Peccato per i lavori di manutenzione che hanno momentaneamente costretto a sistemazioni provvisorie per lo store

title: Visita obligada en Munich
text: Fuimos con niÃ±os, visita guiada en ingles, recomendable, el estadio es bonito, aunque no comparable con el Tour del Bernabeu, dirÃ­a que es un nivel inferior en como esta organizado. Pasamos una buena tarde, muy recomendable para niÃ±os y amantes del futbol.

title: So cool
text: We took a tour of the stadium, and it was so cool. Our tour guide was awesome. The locker room portion of the tour did seem a bit rushed, but it was still so cool to see. It was also awesome to see the trophies after the tour. There is a place in there to put these virtual glasses over your eyes to experience what the stadium is like on game day. Crazy cool! Very nice people work there too.

title: Uno de los mejores estadios del mundo
text: Incluso si no eres aficionado al fÃºtbol, la visita al estadio merece la pena. La visita la puedes hacer solo de la parte del club o combinada con el museo. Se entra por la entrada norte y tiene parquing.  La entrada la compras allÃ­ mismo y puedes hacer solo la del estadio e instalaciones o combinada con el museo. Nosotros hicimos con nuestro hijo de 10 aÃ±os la visita solo del estadio. La tienen organizada por horas, unas en alemÃ¡n y otras en ingles. El guÃ­a que nos tocÃ³, David, fue muy amable. Al salir puedes comprar en la tienda del club.

title: Der Hammer
text: FÃ¼r einen absoluten FCB â€œNicht-Fanâ€, drÃ¼cken wir es mal nett aus :-), bin ich da sehr begeistert rausgegangen. Egal ob in der Erlebnisworld oder der Tour, wenn man Fussball mag, dann geht man da mit GÃ¤nsehaut raus. Hat mir sehr gut gefallen.Wir hatten mit Nicolas einen sehr guten Guide!

title: FCB
text: Die Allianz Arena, Heim des FCB, versprÃ¼ht eine enorme Ambiance.WÃ¤hrend des Tages, nachts und vor allem wÃ¤hrend eines Spiels.Es ist und bleibt eine top location fÃ¼r Fussball-Fans !VIP Bereich, extrem empfehlenswert.

title: Lo Stadio per eccellenza
text: Stadio bellissimo a circa 20 min di auto da Monaco di Baviera.Costo del biglietto per il tour di circa 1 ora  19 euroLa guida accompagna il gruppo partendo dalle gradinate dello stadio, passando per palestra e spogliatoi fino ad arrivare a bordo campo.All'interno un ristorante, shop ed un museo.Esperienza da non perdere

title: Wow!
text: Da appassionato di calcio non poteva assolutamente mancare la visita all' Allianz Arena.Semplicemente spettacolare e di sera illuminato lo stadio Ã¨ ancora piÃ¹ bello.Li troverete oltre allo store anche diversi pub con birra buonissima.

title: A dream of any true Bayern fan
text: Loved the trip to the Allianz arena. We took the guided tour and it was worth every euro! If you are a true fan of the Bayern you won't regret having the experience of visiting it.

title: Really cool tour!
text: We took a tour of the arena with our soccer team. It was a great tour and a really nice stadium. We got to see inside the team's locker room, the exercise room, and other behind the scenes parts of the arena, as well as the museum and of course the gift shop.

title: Needs to be on your itinerary!!
text: A landmark every Bayern Munich fan will want to visit. A beautiful creation of architecture, the only structure in the world capable of changing the exterior colors.

title: Arena tour, and museeum
text: Our second visit, and this time we bring a grandchild.  If your interrest in football ansd stadion(this is realy big business,) I recomind.  The museum is delicate and informative, and the tour was with a good english talking guide with a good sence of humour. The minus for someone, depence on fysical condition of cause, is the long walk from u-bahn station to the arena, on concrete.  On our return i asked if there was some kind of shuttle service, but was not.  On the arena they make god possible for everybody, so my question is , as a moneymaschin like this, shouldent this be possible.

title: Great tour
text: We had a really excellent tour of the stadium which includes the locker room, tunnel, press room, and many more. We really enjoyed it. It was about an hour and a half. Highly recommended if you are a soccer fan.

title: Visita al Bayern
text: Entretenida visita al Allianz...interesante pero nada espectacular, creo que se podrÃ­a sacar mucho mÃ¡s provecho. Lo mejor el guÃ­a, simpÃ¡tico y afable. title: GRAN ESTADIO. BUEN TOUR
text: Ideal para los fanÃ¡ticos del fÃºtbol y en especial del Bayern Munich. IncreÃ­bles instalaciones y fantÃ¡stico museo. Tours en alemÃ¡n e inglÃ©s. Precio: 19 euros, no es necesario reservar on line. El guÃ­a bien, aplicado, correcto. Toma para recorrer todo como unas dos horas. Se llega fÃ¡cilmente vÃ­a metro desde el centro de la ciudad. La estaciÃ³n de metro queda como a 1000 metros del estadio. En 15 o 20 minutos se llega. Hay tienda, aunque los precios son algo elevados. Asimismo el viaje en metro toma unos 15 o 20 minutos mÃ¡s. Buena experiencia
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A Must See If you are FCBM Fan!
text: Visited and toured the arena at a request of our young soccer player. We booked an English tour and were not disappointed. The guide was professional, engaging, and spoke very good English. He made the tour fun. The Mega Store is overrated. Yes, you can find lots of items, but the prices are not too attractive.  Museum on the premises is great, but you have to pay a separate entrance unless you purchase a kombiticket. Overall, it was a great experience. We will be going back at night to see the lighted version in the nighttime :-)

title: trÃ¨s beau
text: Grand stade impressionnant mais surtout trÃ¨s beau de par son architecture en forme de pneu.Et la nuit il est sublime

title: Football fans love this
text: First off - I don't like football. I don't mind watching it over a beer with the guys but I literally have no interest. That may have tained the tour for me. I seemed to be the only person who was just kind of 'meh' about the whole thing. Don't get me wrong though. It was interesting to go through the backstage areas and the tour guide was very friendly and knowlegeable. Football fans would love this - to me it was just some grass surrounded by a lof of seats.

title: Mesmerizing
text: only missing to have the players on the pitch and the cheering sounds of the crowd, it would have made my visit there perfect!make sure to buy the VIP tour as you get some extra perks, the regular tour is as nice and covers all what you need including the player's locker room.go the extra mile and check the timing of when they would put the exterior lights on.

title: Nice to see and do
text: We pre booked our tour. We did the German one but other language is possible. Parking right in front. Dogs not allowed but they offer dog service!Nice tour and friendly people. You must be able to do some stairs.Museum is very nice too even with virtual reality tools.Impresseing survey, even if you support Ajax:))Good food and drink service if you like.We parked our car and went with U bahn to Munich in 20 mins

title: Great tour!
text: My teenage soccer players were thrilled with the museum and guided tour of the stadium. It was the highlight of our vacation.

title: Mia San Mia
text: Awesome for Bayern Munich fans or soccer fans in general. I did the stadium tour and it didn't disappoint. The inside of the stadium, the dressing room, and players tunnel, it gives a fantastic overview and history. Take time to do the team museum as well to check out the accomplishments of the home team.

text: Die AA ist verkehrsgÃ¼nstig zu erreichen. Mit der S Bahn bis FrÃ¶ttmaning und dann ein kleiner 10 Min. Spaziergang bis zur Arena. Mit dem Auto bis vors Stadion. title: FC Baryen Munich
text: This is my first visit to world class football club. Allianz Arena is very beautiful building. Inside the building, there are food courts,  FC Bayern Munich souvenir shop and museum. There is also package tour to inside the stadium with guide. The guide sent us to media room, changing room and bleachers. I bought English speaking tour and it gave me unforgettable moment in my life.

title: FÃ¼hrung ist sehr empfehlenswert !
text: Tolles Stadion, dessen Geschichte und Aufbau in der FÃ¼hrung auf eine Interessante und einladende Weise dargestellt wird. Auch fÃ¼r nicht FCB Fans auf jeden Fall einen Ausflug wert

title: Tolles Arena aber die ParkplÃ¤tze..
text: NatÃ¼rlich ist die Allianz Arena eines der besten Fussballstadien der Welt, aber die ParkplÃ¤tze sind katastrophal organisiert. Wenn man 2-3 Stunden braucht um raus zu kommen dann fehlt es gÃ¤nzlich an Organisation und Planung.Alles beginnt damit, dass man bei der Ausfahrt bezahlen und sich an der Schranke erstmal einzeln anstellen muss, bis es jeden einzeln rauslÃ¤ÃŸt. WÃ¼rde man die Bezahlung bei der Einfahrt ganz einfach erledigen, kÃ¶nnten nach dem Spiel alle Schranken offen gelassen und alle Fahrzeuge flÃ¼ssig ausfahren kÃ¶nnen.Keine grosse Ingenieurskunst...

title: a life time experience to see a football match there
text: landmark architecture of munich indeed. we saw 2 football matched of fc bayern munich there. what an ambiance. very well organized place.

title: One of the best arena
text: If not the best that I visited. Amazing view, and if you are in director box, you have special entrance, and the director floor is amazing

title: Auch ohne FuÃŸballspiel ein Besuch wert
text: Als MÃ¼nchnerin mag ich die Double A einfach. NatÃ¼rlich ist ein Besuch zu einem Spiel ein Highlight! Aber auch ohne Spiel liebe ich es dort herum zu schlendern. Mit Besuch kann man dort eine StadionfÃ¼hrung machen oder auch das FCB Museum oder Fanshop besuchen.Einziges Manko: an Spieltagen ist das Parkhaus ein Krampf. Es dauert bis zu 2 Stunden, bis man raus fahren kann. Und es ist alles sehr weitlÃ¤ufig. Egal wie ob man mit Bus, Bahn oder Auto anreist: viel Wegezeit mit einrechnen!

title: Uno stadio futuristico
text: Allianz Arena Ã¨ uno stadio futuristico che non possiamo nemmeno paragonare ai ns stadi Italiani, forse solo Allianz Arena della Juventus ci si avvicina, da vedere assolutamente. In piÃ¹ Ã¨ comodo perchÃ© si trova sulla strada che porta dalla citta all'aeroporto.

text: Was here for the match where FC Bayern won the title. Gorgeous architecture, scenic views of the alps from the promanade outside and a wonderful FC Bayern megastore. A must go for FC bayern fans.

title: FÃ¼r Fans gut zu erreichen
text: Schon architektonisch ist das FuÃŸballstadion etwas absolut UngewÃ¶hnliches. Hier ist seit 2005 der deutsche FuÃŸballrekordmeister Bayern MÃ¼nchen zuhause. Obwohl es etwa 10 km vom Stadtzentrum entfernt liegt ist es fÃ¼r die Fans gut zu erreichen, entweder mit Ã¶ffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln oder mit dem eigenen Pkw, es steht ein mehr als zehntausend Autos fassendes Parkhaus zur VerfÃ¼gung. Insgesamt eine Anlage,die einer Millionenstadt mehr als gerecht wird.

title: 7.Meisterschaft
text: Guter Gastgeber, jederzeit ein enorm hohes SicherheitsgefÃ¼hl. Gut durchdachtes Sicherheitskonzept. FÃ¼r Essen und Trinken gibt es ausreichend StÃ¤nde auf dem ganzen GelÃ¤nde.

title: Beeindruckend und professionell
text: Nicht nur fÃ¼r BayernFans ein beeindruckendes Erlebnis. Alle Mitarbeiter sind wirklich sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und tatsÃ¤chlich ein bisschen verliebt in ihren FCB. Ich konnte bisher das Catering in der SponsorenArea, der Loge und an einem Spielfreien Tag im Rahmen einer Konferenz genieÃŸen und war immer begeistert. FÃ¼r die Mengen die bekocht werden, in meinen Augen wirklich auÃŸergewÃ¶hnlich.

title: Viel zu klein
text: Ich war zur Meisterschaft da, weil ich glÃ¼cklicherweise Karten zugeteilt bekommen habe, war mit fast 75.000 Kumpels da und habe die neue Inneneinrichtung und den freundlichen Service genossen und natÃ¼rlich das 5:1

title: Vibrante
text: Para os amantes do futebol e atÃ© para quem nÃ£o Ã© esse estÃ¡dio Ã© muito lindo. Local para tirar uma foto e fazer uma mÃ©dia com os amigos.

title: Erlebnis fÃ¼r FuÃŸballspieler
text: Also mein Sohn 10 Jahre war begeistert, er ist ein groÃŸe Fan von FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen und spielt selbst FuÃŸball. Dort gibst Museum, Restaurant und und verschiedene  Touren dur der Stadion.

title: Great place to visit for any fÃºtbol fans!
text: My 11-year-old son is a huge Bayern Munich fan. I had a chance to go to Munich with him and we went to take the tour at the Allianz Arena which was great then visited the museum and then the shop! Overall itâ€™s was a great experience and transit to the stadium is easy as well! Recommended!

title: Superb experience!!
text: I wanted to visit this highly renowned stadium and I ended up getting the chance as well. Right from the subway, we could feel the adrenaline flowing given the number of fans in the train with the team jerseys. The stadium is a 800m walk from the station and easy to find as all roads lead to the stadium. The energy inside the stadium was great and the atmosphere with almost 75k people was electrifying. While returning, it seemed that almost everyone of the crowd was taking the subway. The police did a fantastic job of ensuring that only a limited number of people got in at a time to avoid any stampede and probably the train frequency was better as well. It was mighty impressive. I can give you tips on how to get tickets as a tourist if you need. Don't carry backpacks as you will need to put in a locker outside the stadium which means standing in a line. Power banks are also not allowed. It was raining through the match but as the crowd area was covered, we were happily enjoying the match.

title: Bellissimo Stadio
text: Bellissimo Stadio del Bayer Monaco, al suo interno si trova anche lo Store dove acquistare completi calcio originali Adidas. Un consiglio... andate a vederlo di sera quando si illumina e  cambia colore.. Bellissimo!!!

title: Great tour
text: Beautiful view feom inside the stadium and dressing room from home team. Can get tickets at stadium and vistit the museum for one combo ticket. The tour guy was nice with a lot of info and  enought patience for those tourist that had not enought pictures and want one more.

title: Bello! Andateci!
text: Non sono appassionato di calcio ma lo Ã¨ il mio bambino ed ha chiesto una visita. Bello e ben organizzato. La visita guidata vale la pena e vi condurrÃ  fin negli spogliatoi e nelle sale riservate ai campioni. Poi un bel negozio con prodotti di qualitÃ  (nb le magliette del Bayern qui costano meno che in centro ğŸ˜‰)

title: Bayern zu Hause erleben
text: Wir hatten uns dieses Wochenende in MÃ¼nchen mit dem Bayern Heimspiel als Saisonabschluss ausgesucht. Die Anfahrt und Organisation rund um das Stadion herum war hervorragend....( kennen wir aus anderen StÃ¤dten ganz anders-) U-Bahnen im Minutentakt und das Stadion in 12,13 min zu FuÃŸ erreicht. Klasse MÃ¶glichkeiten um zu essen und trinken - trotz der Massen - 75000 Zuschauer.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bit underwhelmed
text: This stadium is between the Munich citycentre and Munich airport, so expect some traffic (and taxi cost - if by taxi) on your way over.I had seen many matches on TV that were played from this area but the place in person did not have the same impact on me. I was a bit underwhelmed.A visit is recommended only if you are a diehard football fan.

title: Great Day with friends
text: Beautiful and sporty Day in AllianzArena , we enjoyed our day so nice and huge super excited to be there

title: Bayern 3 Hannovre 1
text: Nous sommes allÃ© voir le match de championnat du bayern Munich. Le stade est magistral et vous voyez bien depuis tout en haut.Par contre j'ai trouvÃ© l'ambiance pas terrible par rapport a d'autre stade en Allemagne... Je pense que c'est "a cause" de nombreux touristes prÃ©sent (dont je fais parti) dans le stade et peu de vrais fans ultras. Stuttgart ou Dortmund sont largement plus sympa niveau ambiance

title: Wow!
text: What a stadium! What an atmosphere! Very well organised and beers and snacks were great! I donâ€™t even like football and got â€œsurprisedâ€ by hubby during our weekend with some tickets but I actually enjoyed it! Very safe area around ground and plenty police to keep an eye on everyone.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Amazing Sports Arena
text: Visited whilst in Munich and arranged the behind the scenes tour. Very interesting and an amazing football ground. Really good to see it in real life as opposed to tv. Museum and shop also very good.

title: Heel mooi stadion
text: In combinatie met het museum een rondleiding gehad.Leuke gids met allerlei feitjes.Altijd leuk zo achter de schermen, we kwamen zelfs richting het veld met de CL hymne

title: Golllllllll!!!!!!
text: Premetto che non mi entusiasma visitare uno stadio, ma in gita a Monaco non potevo esimermi dal vedere l'Allianz Arena con l'annesso museo....un solo commento SPETTACOLARE

title: Dream for a young fan
text: My 9 year old sons rates this "Infinity and beyond stars". This may have been the highlight of his young life. He got a tour of the stadium, walked out of the tunnel like the players, and saw the collection of football trophies at the Bayern museum. A must for Bayern fans.

title: Prachtig stadion
text: Op een wedstrijddag een tour door het stadion gedaan. Beetje duur (eur 49 voor volwassenen) maar wel erg mooi stadion om te zien. Daarna door een prachtig museum gewandeld, de fanshop bezocht en lekker kunnen eten (pizza, pasta of dagschotel voor 7,50 is dan weer niet duur) en daarna een wedstrijd bezocht. Prachtige dag.

title: Architecture originale
text: Un peu loin du centre-ville, le stade se fait remarquer par son architecture originale. C'est sÃ»r qu'il reprÃ©sente plus qu'un stade aux yeux des fans de foot.

title: Bayern vs ManU
text: El estadio me encanta. Es una pieza hermosa de arquitectura moderna, sÃºper funcional y donde cualquier evento en la cancha puede apreciarse muy bien desde cualquier parte. Yo no tendrÃ­a reparo alguno de darle 5 estrellas, en realidad, pero sucede que este estadio tiene, desde mi punto de vista, dos enormes, grandÃ­simas desventajas: resumido se trata del estacionamiento y el sistema de pago. El segundo primero. Para pagar cualquier cosa que se desee adquirir es necesario hacerse de unas tarjetas â€œAllianz Karteâ€ que se pueden â€œllenarâ€ con dinero. Sin ellas ni un vaso con agua te dan. El problema es conseguir una de estas. Largas colas para hacerte de una y ponerle la cantidad de dinero que piensas gastarÃ¡s durante el partido. Innecesario e irritante a mÃ¡s no poder. AdemÃ¡s los vasos de los que se bebe tienen importe de â‚¬2. Y aquÃ­ un ejemplo de lo ridÃ­culo que es este sistema de pago en combinaciÃ³n con el importe en los vasos: en mi Allianz Karte tengo â‚¬10.40. Pido dos sodas que cuestan cada una â‚¬4.10. Pero resulta que con el importe son â‚¬6.10 x 2 = â‚¬12.20! Mierda!, no me alcanza con lo que resta en la tarjeta. Entonces pido una soda, en la tarjeta quedan â‚¬4.30. Nos bebemos la soda. Me formo en la fila nuevamente para regresar el vaso y recuperar los â‚¬2. Estos pido los aÃ±adan a mi Allianz Karte y ahora tengo â‚¬6.30. Ahora ya tengo suficiente para una soda mÃ¡s!, asÃ­ que la pido, nos la bebemos y me vuelvo a formar para que me regresen â‚¬2, pero cuando me doy cuenta que solo tendrÃ© â‚¬2,2 en una tarjeta que pronto acabarÃ¡ en el olvido en cuanto regrese a casa de vacaciones, decido quedarme con el vaso como souvenir. Y para concluir, el estacionamiento. Ã‰ste es de lo mÃ¡s ridÃ­culo que pueda existir. Nos tomÃ³ mÃ¡s de una hora entrar y mÃ¡s de dos salir. NingÃºn tipo de organizaciÃ³n, asÃ­ que este sitio alemÃ¡n pone en duda el mito de que los alemanes son el pueblo mÃ¡s organizado del mundo. No estoy tan seguro ya. AdemÃ¡s (otro ademÃ¡s) para poder salir del estacionamiento del estadio, es necesario pagar con... con...? Adivinan? Con la Allianz Karte! Si no, no sales. Por cierto, ni se te ocurra, por nada del mundo, llegar hasta la pluma en el estacionamiento para salir y no tener mÃ­nimo â‚¬10 en la tarjeta. Te asesinarÃ¡n las hordas de fanÃ¡ticos ebrios que esperan detrÃ¡s de ti, desesperados por salir.

title: Uno dei templi del calcio
text: Se venite a Monaco di Baviera non potete perdervi il tour dello stadio. Fin dall'arrivo alla stazione metro di Frottmaning, si vede l sua maestositÃ  e l'emozione aumenta man mano che ci si avvicina. Ci si siede sugli spalti (la curva di fronte a quella degli ultras del Bayern), si va begli spogliatoi, si percorre la scaletta di accesso al campo (purtroppo non si puÃ² andare oltre l'ultimo gradino) e si vede la mixed zone, con il luogo dove entrano i calciatori. Purtroppo le guide sono solo in inglese e tedesco (nonostante i tanti italiani) ma non Ã¨ un problema capirli, dal momento che parlano un ottimo inglese e sono anche simpatici. Store fornito e con prezzi piÃ¹ economici rispetto all'Italia.

title: Sensationeller Abend gegen Borussia Dortmund
text: 75.000 Zuschauer, modernes Stadion, super Architektur, 5:0 gegen Borussia Dortmund gewonnen, die schon sicher verloren geglaubte Meisterschaft wieder in Sichtweite, keine Pyros, keine Randale oder Ausschreitungen, das war ein super FuÃŸballsamstag in der Allianz Arena. Die Sicht aufs Spielfeld ist gut. Nach dem Spiel leuchtet das Stadion abends in den roten Bayern-Farben. FuÃŸballherz - was willst du mehr.

title: A voir !
text: A voir pour l'architecture... Si vous Ãªtes un amateur de foot, vous serez comblÃ©, surtout pour la boutique oÃ¹ vous repartirez avec l'inimaginable ! Manquent les sex toys, mais Ã§a devrait arriver prochainement

title: Ladny stadion
text: Na odludziu i daleko od cywilizacji ale ladnie,mnostwo parkingow,duzo miejsca.Stadion oczywiscie robi wrazenie.Fajne knajpki i swietny fanshop.

title: Allianz Arena
text: Schitterend stadion waar bayern MÃ¼nchen speelt.Duidelijke rondleiding door stadion erg vriendelijke en zowaar grappige gids.Je komt op tribune persruimte en kleedkamers en met de groep ga je door de spelers tunnel als twee teams met muziek van champions legue.

title: Modern, futuristisch... cool
text: DAS Stadion in Deutschland... Abends mehrfarbig...Modern mit einem netten Verein... der alter.. neuer?! Meister war ist... war ist... war ist!!! FÃ¼r Bayern Fans ein Must....

text: Awesome place to visit. Itâ€™s a must to do thing for football lovers. The arena is easily accessible through the U6 Bahn. However it remains closed sometimes and hence my advice is to plan a visit on match day.

text: Excellent English tour,very informative spoilt slightly by non English speaking guests who rudely drowned out the guide with incessant chatting.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Visita allo stadio
text: Struttura bella e moderna per i tempi odierni. Accessibile facilmente. Annessa nella struttura 2 store per eventuali acquisti, museo delle squadre e birrerie bistro. Prezzo per visita museo e stadio a parer mio oneroso.

title: Visita Allianz Arena e Monaco con camper
text: Lâ€™allianz Ã¨ davvero uno stadio fantastico, la guida (solo in inglese o tedesco) ci ha condotto in un giro dello stesso per circa unâ€™ora passando anche dagli spogliatoi ed entrando in campo con la sigla della campions Ligue.. i miei figli erano entusiasti.. chiaramente poi siamo passati dal museo e poi allo shop dove non si potevano non acquistare due magliette dei calciatori.X quel che riguarda il Parcheggio Ã¨ comodo alla metropolitana U6 linea blu FrÃ¶ttmaning, la fermata si trova esattamente allâ€™opposto rispetto al parcheggio a circa un km, noi per comoditÃ  entravamo nello stadio e gli giravano attorno altrimenti si puÃ² passare sotto lo stesso quando i cancelli sono chiusi.. il parcheggio di per sÃ¨ ha solo il servizio carico (1 euro x 10 minuti di acqua) e lo scarico gratuito, poi i servizi uomo/donna ma se si ha il camper trovo sia il posto piÃ¹ comodo per raggiungere il centro cittÃ .

title: LFC UCL Game
text: Great Stadium which hogs the skyline as you approach from the station. Tight security leading to the stadium but once you're through you can walk around and buy food, merchandise etc.Views from away section are great and no problems encountered at any time.
