title: English guided tour
text: We had an English guided tour within the arena and it was very informative and the guide was very eloquent and patient. The down side was the distance from the train station to the stadia. It was quite some distance.

title: Icona
text: Lâ€™Allianz Arena di Monaco fa parte del circuito degli stadi Allianz e come nello stile oramai noto si presenta, imperioso e misterioso. Qui si respira lâ€™aria della tifoseria assiepata sugli spalti pronti a sostenere la squadra del cuore. Vista da fuori Ã¨ davvero bella

title: Buena Experiencia.
text: Es un lugar bastante reconocido, es la casa del equipo de Futbol Baren Munich, para los aficionados al Futbol, es una visita obligada!!!

title: Bello
text: Visita molto interessante, scopri un mondo veramente particolare dal suo interno, il calcio delle grandi squadre. Merita una visita.

title: Brill
text: What a fantastic looking stadium. We didnâ€™t manage to do a tour inside as it was match day but it was worth the train journey over just to see it up close.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Deutschland Ã¼ber alles
text: Fantastijen experienz dÃ¹m aut lauf gepromen unter master Herr yahwoll. DentÃ r dÃ¼rr und fÃ¶ra mÃ²ll. Unten brake gitte morgen zu ibrache fÃ¶ra l'orggen

title: komische Stimmung in modernem Zweckbau
text: Weit ausserhalb der Stadt gelegen und mit dem Charme eines Zweckbaus in Mitten einer Industrieanlage und neben einer Autobahn - gemÃ¼tlich ist was anderes und von den heimischen Fans war kaum etwas zu hÃ¶ren.....

title: Bayern munich vs. Werder
text: Great game. Munich won 1-0.  What an amazing experience to see German foitball. The fans are devoted. My kids loved it as they are soccer players at home.

title: Stadium tour
text: The arena is pretty much in the middle of nowhere but easily accessible by train. Itâ€™s an imposing and impressive stadium from the outside and equally as impressive from the inside. We had booked an hours tour and the guide was extremely knowledgeable and the delivery of the tour was seamless with ample opportunities to take photographs. We also visited the megastore and the huge museum which shows the dominance that Bayern Munich have had in German football for many many years. We also ate in the restaurant and the food was of very good quality at reasonable prices. Would recommend this tour - we had pre booked the combi tour & museum ticket online. A very enjoyable morning.

title: Stimmung wie in einem Kreisliga stadion
text: Ich war hier zum Spiel gegen Werder Bremen an einem wunderschÃ¶nen Ostersamstag.Das Wetter war Mega schÃ¶n, 25 grad, Sonnenschein.Die Anfahrt zum Stadion ist super organisiert. U-Bahn, S-Bahn alles sehr einfach. Aus der Innenstadt braucht man ca 30-40 Minuten bis man da ist.Der FuÃŸweg zum Stadion dauert knapp 10 Minuten je nachdem wie gut man zu FuÃŸ ist.Im Stadion angekommen wunderte ich mich persÃ¶nlich Ã¼ber ein komplettes Rauchverbot auf den PlÃ¤tzen.Ich als Raucher fand es nicht so gut, allerdings muss man sagen das es schon sehr gut so ist. Somit Kann man auch sehr gut hier mit Kindern hin ohne das sie die ganze Zeit dem Rauch ausgesetzt sind.Die Stimmung in der Arena ist absolut schlecht. Es gibt wohl 2 Bayern Fan BlÃ¶cke, allerdings kommt da keine Rechte Stimmung auf. Der GÃ¤steblock ist oben in der Kurve unter dem Dach, da ist es eigentlich immer LautstÃ¤rke mÃ¤ÃŸig deutlich mehr Man kann es kurzum eigentlich sagen das hier eher Eventfans kommen und es mehr ein Erlebnis hier im Stadion ist. Richtige FuÃŸball Stimmung kommt hier nicht auf. Alles in allem lohnt sich ein Besuch auf jeden Fall. Die Arena mal gesehen zu haben war sehr schÃ¶n. Wer allerdings auf die gute alte FuÃŸball Stimmung steht ist denke ich im GrÃ¼nwald besser aufgehoben.Werde ich definitiv bei meinem nÃ¤chsten Besuch auch machen.

title: Sport enthusiast
text: Stadium and tour are ok, but nothing special. Bartender are very rude and an pleasant. Very small choice of food in restaurant. Stadium museum is very interesting place. Overall nice place but only for football fans.

title: Vista dello stadio
text: Una costruzione davvero particolare molto bella e avveniristica giocare li deve essere uno spettacolo come assistere alle partite

title: One of the most beautiful soccer stadiums in the world
text: The Allianz Arena is definitely one of the most beautiful and iconic soccer stadiums in the world. The atmosphre during a match is amazing and fascinating. The museum shows the history of the FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen, one of the best clubs in the world

title: Immer wieder eine einmalige AtmosphÃ¤re
text: Hier gewesen zum Heimspiel gegen Werder Bremen. Jetzt endlich auch mit Kartenzahlung im Stadion und nicht nur mit Allianzarenacard. Die Organisation bei Essen und GetrÃ¤nke ist nach wie vor verbesserungswÃ¼rdig, was die Schnelligkeit und Koordination angeht.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Top stadion
text: Super stadion en wat een sfeer als deze volledig is uitverkocht! Bayern MÃ¼nchen mag blij zijn met zo een top locatie om in te spelen.

title: 'Must see while in Munich'
text: My 10 year old had been wanting to visit the Allianz for ages. So we got cheap flights and here we are. As soon as you step out of the train station, you see the Allianz. It's such a stunning building. We bought the Combi ticket which included the museum. We had a timed entry, so did the museum first. This is definitely worth seeing. I didn't realise actually how successful Bayern Munich were. There is lots of interactive stuff for kids to do. Then we made our way to meet our guide for the tour. The tour lasts an hour or so and is really good. You get to sit in the stands, see the dressing rooms and the tunnel and the outside of the stadium and its changing colours is explained. The restaurant is reasonably priced (we had lunch here), and the shop is huge. But its definitely worth a visit.

title: Gigantisch - alles vom Feinsten
text: Ich habe vorab 2 Tickets fÃ¼r zwei thailÃ¤ndische Bekannte gebucht was Ã¼ber die Website ganz unkompliziert war.Ausschilderung zur Arena sehr gut. Von der City mit Auto ca 1/2 Stde, da der Verkehr sehr stark ist. UBahn ist aber auch mÃ¶glich.Parken Busparkplatz Mitte (nur an spielfreien Tagen)-dann sind es nur noch ein paar Schritte zur Erlebniswelt und zum Sammelpunkt. Die Erlebniswelt ist sehr groÃŸ und sehr interessant. Die FÃ¼hrung lieÃŸ keine WÃ¼nsche Ã¼brig. Alles konnte in Ruhe (Tour 1 Std) besichtigt werden. Tour war in Englisch und der weibliche Guide war sehr gut in den ErklÃ¤rungen. Meine ThailÃ¤ndischen Freunde waren sehr begeistert

title: Mooier van ver en van binnen
text: Van ver zeg je wat een mooi stadion.Sta je er uiteindelijk naast, is het eigenlijk spuuglelijk als het niet gekleurd is.Zelf de stadion tour gedaan, wat best gehaast gebeurde. Het is wel mooi en alles goed te bezichtigen. Alleen het veld mag je niet op, dat is wel jammer.

title: Ok
text: Ik ben hier geweest met de match FCB - BVB. De ingang is een ramp. Aparte ingangen voor vrouwen. Hier mogen er best wat meer zijn, zodat de ingang tot het stadion een beetje vooruit gaat. Iets kopen in het stadion is als bezoeker rampzalig. Ze verkopen overal andere zaken. Wanneer je dan iets bemachtigd hebt, dan mag dit niet mee op de tribune. Rookverbod in het ganze stadion vind ik wel ok. Goede verbinding met de U-bahn. Het is wel erg dat in heel Duitsland in een voetbalticket gebruik van openbaar vervoer inc. Is, behalve in MÃ¼nchen. Openbaar vervoer is heel duur. Nooit anders geweest.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Was fÃ¼r Fussballfans
text: Schon beeindruckend wenn das Stadion komplett ausverkauft ist. Lichtshow, Stimmung und organisatorische AblÃ¤ufe sind top. Selbst An- und Abfahrt aus der Tiefgarage geht relativ zÃ¼gig. Und wenn Bayern dann noch hoch gewinnt, lÃ¤uft es.

title: Partita di Champion Bayern Munich Vs AK Atene
text: Bellissimo stadio dove potersi godere la visione di una partita con il proprio foglio adolescente senza avere il timore di scontri tra tifosi. E le partite si vedono in.maniera  meravigliosa.  Consigliato a tutti anche pr famiglie con bambini.

title: Great Day Out
text: Great stadium and easy to get to by train. only 5 mins walk from station. Museum was excellent and the tour was great and very informative would highly recommend even my wife liked it and shes not into football.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Hochinteressant !!
text: FCB Erlebniswelt ist wirklich ein Erlebnis !Sehr interessant aufgebaut mit vielen Ãœberraschungen und bestem Fanshop.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mecz, mecz, mecz !!!
text: Warto, ale tylko na mecz bo Å¼eby jechaÄ‡ na ten poÅ‚oÅ¼ony na odludziu, prawie w szczerym polu stadion specjalnie dla niego ??? Co to to nie !!!

title: Traumbesuch
text: 5:0 Sieg gegen BVB sagt alles, kommen gerne wieder, fantastische Stimmung, U-Bahn verkehrt im Minutentakt
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Tolles Stadion mit furchtbarer Organisation
text: Ich war mal wieder zum einem AuswÃ¤rtsspiel in der Allianzarena. Es ist ein sehr schÃ¶nes, modernes FuÃŸballstadion. Eine StadionfÃ¼hrung lohnt sich auch auf jeden Fall. Jedoch ist die das Drumherum eine Katastrophe. Es gibt nur eine U-Bahn Station, so dass nach Abpfiff fast alle Menschen Ã¼ber die ewig weite esplanade dorthin strÃ¶men (da die ParkhÃ¤user und ParkplÃ¤tze auch dort sind). Da der Bahnsteig Ã¼berfÃ¼llt war, wurde der Weg zur u Bahn erstmal geschlossen und es hieÃŸ lange warten. Warten muss man zwar woanders aus, aber in MÃ¼nchen ist es extrem, weil es sich nicht verteilt. Auf dem Weg zur U-Bahn gab es wenig PolizeiprÃ¤sens oder SicherheitskrÃ¤fte. AuÃŸerdem war unterwegs kein Bierstand oder ein Stand, an dem man etwas zu essen kaufen konnte. Im Stadion haben wir uns eine Allianzcard zum Bezahlen geholt. Jedoch durfte man weder etwas zu essen noch GetrÃ¤nke mit in den GÃ¤steblock nehmen. So ein BlÃ¶dsinn. Sowas habe ich in noch keinem anderen Stadion erlebt. AuÃŸerdem kann man mittlerweile in sÃ¤mtlichen Stadien im GÃ¤steblock bar zahlen. Nach dem Spiel mussten wir ewig anstehen um uns unser Geld auszahlen zu lassen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fantastic morning out!
text: Visited here as a birthday treat for one teenager, joined by another teenager! Pre-booked tickets for the museum and guided tour of the stadium, travelled from the centre of Munich on the tube, which was easy to navigate!Museum was very interesting, plenty to see and lots of interactive parts to join in with.Guided tour was really interesting, guide was informative and entertaining! Plenty of chance for photos and questions!Ate in the snack bar after, which was lovely and very reasonable.Birthday money spent in gift shop, again very reasonable! Highly recommend!

title: Good. Better to be visited. Not baby friendly
text: At first I should say that I am a bayern munich super fan! I always wanted to visit allianz arena. I am a little dissapointed now. I went there with my wife, my baby and a couple of friends. The arena tour is about 1 hour. There was a tour guide guy ( ours was Igor) which was not very friendly. Your are restricted to a tight schedule of your tour guide. You can not go down to coach seat near the green box. And it is absolutely not a baby friendly tour and no one is interested to help you with that. The museum is fine and beautiful. The worst thing is that if you go there in your own car you are not guided by any means ( no signs or person) how to start the tour. You will be in the middle of a bus parking with many doors...Overall it is a very special stadium and worth visiting once but my experience in Santiago bernabeo and Nou camp was much more better.

title: Visiter ? Pas possible !
text: Nous arrivons au guichet Ã  17h15 pour acheter nos billets pour la visite du stade.Pas possible ! Pourquoi ? Parce que nous finissons notre journÃ©e Ã  18h ....MÃªme aprÃ¨s des pourparlers, rien n'y fait. MÃªme juste un regard sur la pelouse.  Apparemment, pour ces teutons-lÃ , l'heure c'est l'heure (d'avant). Tant pis, fiston, tu ne verras pas la pelouse du Bayern.

title: Soccer match
text: Crowd was boisterous but orderly. The stadium and atmosphere was incredible. Even when you r not a fan, you will be moved by the supporters and the team.

title: Game day - Hereâ€™s what you need to know
text: Getting to the arena by train is simple. There is one main stall at the train station for buying scarfs, hats etc. Even seat pads!! The esplanade leads up to the stadium, a guy with a trolly collects bottles and there are even toilets, rubbish bins and a few seats on the way. Outside the stadium there are a few more small official merchandise shops however the main superstore in the main stadium is not to be missed.Before entering the arena every one gets searched, there is a woman area to the left of each line and no paper tickets required as you can use your mobile phone. Once on the stadium you can get beer, pretzels etc. On the way home the train platform was very very busy however trains ran very frequently!A great stadium.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nicht GÃ¤ste und kinderfreundlich
text: Wir waren als Gastverein dort. Als Gastverein darf man keine GetrÃ¤nke und Essen mit auf die RÃ¤nge nehmen. Selbst 7- oder 8jÃ¤hrige Kinder lieÃŸ man nicht mit einem Becher Mineralwasser und BratwÃ¼rstchen auf die RÃ¤nge. Ein Rang daneben fÃ¼r Fans des FC Bayern war es ok.Vor dem Spiel macht der Stadionsprecher einen auf kinderfreundlich. Holen Kinder auf den Rasen zum Interview........Irgendwie falsch WeltIn Wahrheit ist man nicht kinderfreundlich.Nie wieder!!!!

title: Was ein Stadion!
text: Wir waren hier zum Klassiker FCB gegen den BVB. Ich muss sagen der Einlass ist super organisiert, auf dem Weg von der U-Bahn Haltestelle bis zum Stadion befinden sich noch einmal kostenfreie Toiletten (zumindest am Spieltag).

title: FC Bayern - BVB
text: Bundesliga Topspiel. Gute ParkmÃ¶glichkeiten an der Arena. Effizienter Einlass. Paulaner Fantreff bietet gute Speisen und GetrÃ¤nke. FC Bayern Megastore mit sehr guter Auswahl an Fanartikeln und ein sensationelles Topspiel gegen Borussia Dortmund.

title: Ver fc Bayern y james 11

title: Heimat der Bayern
text: UnabhÃ¤ngig von der WirkungsstÃ¤tte des FCB wurde das Stadion in kÃ¼rzester Zeit zurecht zum Wahrzeichen MÃ¼nchens der Neuzeit. Architektonisch auÃŸen ein Hingucker und innen eine Fussballarena moderner PrÃ¤gung. Was hier an einem Spieltag an Logistik ablÃ¤uft kann man nur bewundern. Wenn es Ã¼berhaupt ein Manko an der SportstÃ¤tte gibt, ist es die Wartezeit in den ParkhÃ¤usern nach Spielende. Hier empfiehlt es sich sich anderweitig zu organisieren.

title: Freunde
text: Ein toller Abend in einem wunderbaren Stadion. Der Service im Stadion entspricht Championsleague. Werden wiederkommen.

text: Limpo, sinalizado, Ã³timo atendimento, um excelente jogo, com pessoas educadas, existia um cartÃ£o para compra de comidas e bebidas.

title: Moderno
text: Stadio davvero moderno, dotato di ogni comfort. Splendida la struttura esterna e magnifica la vista dello stadio vuoto con la coreografia data dai seggiolini. Da migliorare la visita allo stadio, dovrebbe essere piu accogliente e si potrebbe permettere la visita delle panchine, cosÃ¬ come avviene negli stadi spagnoli.

title: SchÃ¶nes Stadion, informative FÃ¼hrung
text: Bei einem MÃ¼nchenbesuch mit meinem Freund war das natÃ¼rlich Pflicht. Wir hatten eine sehr informative FÃ¼hrung mit einer netten, smypathischen Dame, die auch auf alle Fragen eingegangen ist. Man bekommt einen Einblick in die Welt des FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen. Das Museum kann auch besucht werden. Sehr interessant!

title: Tolles Stadion
text: Moderne Arena mit sehr guter Anbindung in die Innenstadt. ich Empfehle eine Stadiontour auch ohne FuÃŸballspiel.

title: Amazing Stadium for soccer lovers
text: A great place to know. Stadium is just few minutes from Central Station by train. Ticket is around 20 euros to have the tour

title: Tolles Stadion, mit oder ohne Spiel eine Reise wert
text: Wir waren schon mehr mals in der Arena. Egal ob zu einem Fussballspiel oder nur fÃ¼r die Arena-Tour - es ist immer eine Reise wert.

title: sehr schÃ¶n !!
text: Die Allianz Arena kann man sowohl besichtigen, als auch bei Spielen vor Ort sein. Ich habe beides gemacht.Die Allianz Arena gehÃ¶rt zu den wenigen Stadien, die neugebaut wurden, aber einen sehr eigenen Charakter haben. Das finde ich wirklich positiv.

title: Super Stadion tolle Kulisse
text: Voll Ausverkauftes Stadion, super AtmosphÃ¤re. Schwer an Karten zu gelangen aber jeden Cent wert.Gerne wieder

title: Imponerande
text: Vi tog den guidade turen inne i den mÃ¤ktiga arenan. Vi hade en vÃ¤ldigt bra guide och fick mycket intressant information. Den tog en timme. I priset ingick ocksÃ¥ intrÃ¤de till Bayerns museum. Det var stort med mÃ¥nga olika inslag.

title: Exterior bisa berubah warna
text: Kami mengunjungi stadium ini di akhir 2017 dan hanya melihat tampak depannya, tidak masuk ke dalam, karenanya informasi kali ini hanya sepanjang yang diketahui. Dinamakan Allianz Arena karena Allianz Yang membeli hak pemberian nama sehingga berhak menggunakan nama Allianz Arena selama 30 tahun, meski jika ada perhelatan penting nama ini tidak bisa digunakan. Ber lokasi di Munich, Germany, yang merupakan Markas dari kesebelasan Bayern Munich dan kesebelasan nasional German.Stadion ini bisa berubah warna menjadi biru, merah, putih dan merupakan Stadion bola pertama di dunia Yang dapat berubah warna eksterior nya secara penuh, menarik bukan? Stadion ini di-arsitek-i oleh Herzog & de Meuron yang berasal dari Swiss. Stadion ini mulai dibangun tahun 2002 dan mulai beroperasi tahun 2005.Sayang sekali kami hanya bisa mengagumi dari sisi luar nya saja, namun sangat menarik membaca sejarahnya.

title: Excelente experiencia
text: Una experiencia Ãºnica seas o no fan del Bayern. Las instalaciones estÃ¡n en perfecto estado y dentro encuentras bar restaurante y un mega fan Shop. Recomiendo tomar el tour combinado de museo y arenas en donde conocerÃ¡n mÃ¡s sobre la historia de este equipo.

title: Super
text: Bis auf die Einweiser die das ganze mit den PlÃ¤tzen nicht wirklich im Griff hatten. Wir waren zum Schweinsteiger Abschiedsspiel da. Die Stimmung war phÃ¤nomenal und man hat in diesem Stadion eine sensationelle Akustik und eine tolle Sicht.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bayern Munchen's home
text: Allianz Arena is a grand stadium located outside the Munich city and is the home for Bayern Munchen football team. Your experience at the stadium depends on whether you like soccer and allied activities. Please note that the signs are in German totally and for non-Germans like me it was a problem. The stadium tour is costly and is worth only if you are a die hard soccer/ Bayern Munich fan. Else would suggest people to enjoy the food and see the stadium from outside.

title: Visit for a match.
text: As an F.C. Bayern Munchen fan, it's easy to write a review of the Allianz, however, a match is a must here, the facilities are superb and easily accessible. But the real joy of the Allianz is seeing the Sudkurve in full song. Also a nice touch is the Arena card, everything is purchased by a debit style card, first you put a sum of money on the card at a booth, this stays on the card until used. If you buy snacks or drinks the card is given to the vendor and the cost subtracted. Being part of a 75,000 family for 90 minutes is also something to cherish from a visit to the Allianz. Mia San Mia.

title: Best soccer team of the world
text: Went there for a game. Electric and impressive ambience. Easy to access by train, taxi or even car (not recommended). There are several fan shops, snack or drink stands and the staff is helpful. I highly recommend to go there for a game

title: Allianz Arena
text: Extremt cool och vÃ¤lbyggd arena som ligger lite off, en bit utanfÃ¶r MÃ¼nchen. Transporten dit och tillbaka med tÃ¥g var relativt smidig, men det som drar ner betyget nÃ¥got var att sÃ¤kerhetskontrollen var extremt osmidig, med en flaskhals-kÃ¶ som tog extremt lÃ¥ng tid. Men helthetsintrycket av arenaupplevelsen var hÃ¤ftigt - sÃ¤rskilt med tanke pÃ¥ att Liverpool slog ut Bayern i Champions League!

title: Entrance fee only worth it for true fans of FC Bayern
text: 19â‚¬ is the regular entrance fee for both the Arena Tour and FC Bayern Erlebniswelt, which is kind of like a holy shrine to the FC Bayern soccer team. It is not possible to just buy a ticket to enter the arena. All the staff was super nice and friendly. It was interesting to get an understanding about the big money making culture of the enterprise FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen, but not being a soccer fan myself I did not have any wow monents. All the signs in the arena are only in German and it is difficult to find the starting point for the arena tours, as it is located in the back of the restaurant, in between tables where other people are eating.

title: Watching game
text: One of the best football grounds in Europe with big atmosphere . Always full and you will see the big crowd always singing and sapport the team .

title: Great stadium
text: Went to watch Bayern Munich v Liverpool.The stadium is great. Modern with lots of food choices. Atmosphere is superb. Would recommend to any football fan.

title: Game day!
text: Went to a Bayern v. Mainz game. It was packed! My first experience of European soccer and it was fantastic. The train was packed like sardines both ways but everyone was nice and still smiling. It was also raining and cold but the atmosphere was still so exciting. Easy to get into the game. Would recommend!!

title: Win
text: A good atmosphere, especially with a Liverpool win!Limited toilets and refreshments for away supporters up in `The Gods' on the 3rd level. Good access in and out of the stadium but don't ever bother driving there by car or taxi, you'll be there hours after the game.Instead use the train, about 20/25 minutes walk from ground.

title: Magnificent Stadium
text: Went to the Bayern - Liverpool game, as a Liverpool fan.  Magnificent stadium, looked fantastic as we walked up towards it from the U-Bahn station, bathed in red light.  Low-profile policing and stewarding helped create an excellent atmosphere. We were in the upper tier - beware there are a significant number of steps up to the top, a long climb for the unfit (or anyone really!) Not much in the concourse - bars are a bit small and heavily used.  Inside it's a magnificent sight, and the Bayern fans create a great atmosphere.  Great place to watch a big match.

title: Allaiz arena tour
text: We done the arena tour as part of a group trip to Munich, the tour was very reasonably priced and our tour guide was informative and the museam at the end was well set out and showed the history of the club in an enjoyable way way

title: Modern stadium and great game
text: My colleague took me to the Bayern Munich game - bought tickets month in advance when we learned about the plan to be in the city for business.Enjoyed the game and the place! Despite the drastic change in the temperature and falling heavy rain, you do not feel the weather inside as there is roof above. You also see everything regardless of the seat purchased - up or down, the stadium is planned to provide visibility from everywhere.

title: Home of every FC Bayern Fan
text: I was at Allianz Arena several times as a huge FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen Fan for more than 20 years. Use the opportunity to buy your ticket to the stadium tour and enjoy the remarkable piece of football history.

title: Bayern Munchen-Wolfsburg
text: Really nice place watching football. Little bit long trip train maybe 40min from central but easy take train. Follow football signs of Marienplaz station or other Munich fans.Station customer service is very fast. Here is lots of toiletsand beer,food shops and you can pay also credit card. Many fans pay Arena card. I pay credit card and everything is fine.

text: Allianz Arena ein Stadium das auf viele Securitys besteht. Auf ein tolles Service und tolle Menschen. SchÃ¶n ist es wenn alles sich leuchtet das ist der Hammer!

title: Not as good as expected
text: Visually this stadium is pretty stunning from outside so we were looking forward to finding out more and seeing the inside.Sadly the tour was very rushed and having beeen told at the start we could take as many pictures/videos as we wanted if would have been nice to have the opportunity do so.Too often our guide was sprinting ahead to the next part of the tour , almost as though we were too much trouble for him. On 2 occasions we caught up with another group and had to kill time in corridors.The â€˜tunnelâ€™ experience was also rather pointless with the end of the tunnel on to the pitch being closed as it was cold!Apparent was our own fault for visiting on March.So, a disappointing tour compared to other stadium tours and internally the stadium itself doesnâ€™t quite match up to the exterior.We then headed for food in the restaurant where the only real vegetarian option was not available. The man serving was also incredibly rude whilst we were ordering - not impressed with him at all.

title: PilgerstÃ¤tte eines jeden FCB Fans âšªï¸ğŸ”´
text: Der erste Besuch in der Allianz Arena hatte nicht besser sein kÃ¶nnen. Wir waren 2h vor Anpfiff an der U-Bahn Station und konnte von dort zur Arena laufen. Wir haben jeden Schritt genossen - die Entfernung war in Ordnung. Der Einlass hat reibungslos und schnell mit der Apple Wallet funktioniert (aelektronische Tickets). In der Arena wird dann zusÃ¤tzlich noch penibel darauf geachtet, das jeder nur zu dem Block Zugang hat, von dem er auch das Ticket besitzt. Die Preise fÃ¼r Speisen und GetrÃ¤nke sind moderat, aber nicht teurer als gewohnt. Die AtmosphÃ¤re im Stadion ist Klasse und wir haben regelmÃ¤ÃŸig GÃ¤nsehaut bekommen. Nach dem Spiel (6:0 gegen Wolfsburg und die TabellenfÃ¼hrung zuruckgeholt) ging es wieder Richtung U-Bahn. Wie zu erwarten hat es etwas lÃ¤nger gedauert. ABER: Top Organisation - aller 2min eine neue U-Bahn und Personal, die darauf achtet das die Bahnen nicht zu voll werden.

title: Steriel
text: De Allianz Arena is perfect, althans wat betreft zichtlijnen en zitcomfort. Het stadion zit altijd bomvol met 75.000 toeschouwers. De omgeving is echter enigszins bizar. De Arena ligt afgelegen is een soort van verlaten maanlandschap. Het ademt geen enkele historie. Dat maakt het stadion veel minder interessant dan menig andere voetbalarena.

title: Watched St Pauli vs 1860 Munchen - Really good experience.
text: A must visit for any football fans - I couldn't afford a ticket for a Bayern Munich game but I visited two years ago when 1860 Munchen were playing their home games there. Called up a couple of days before and managed to get a ticket for 1860 vs St Pauli for about Â£20 in pretty good seats.The stadium wasn't even half full, so the atmosphere wasn't as good as it could've been but still well worth visiting.

title: Iconic Destination
text: If you are a sports lover, there are few land marks you would like to step in. Following Stamford Bridge and Lords this is one of the places I really wanted to see for real. Glad that I made it. A 30/40 minute walk from the station is really enjoyable. We chose the perfect timing where we saw both day and night versions of the stadium as colorful lights takes over the shell after dark. Both S bahn and U bahn train services are available to take you from the city.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Si te gusta el Futbol debes ir
text: un excelente plan para los amantes del futbol, donde en su museo encontraran la gloria del bayern, y con el camino guiado por un guia experto en diferentes idiomas se puede disfrutar de los espacios internos del estadio y los camerinos donde se preparan los jugadores, una muy grata experiencia

title: Ein einzigartiges Bauwerk
text: Ich habe schon einige Stadie besucht, aber die Allianz Arena sticht doch deutlich heraus. Die Architektur ist absolut spektakulÃ¤r. Allein die Luftkissen-Fassade, die in 16 Millionen Farben beleuchtet werden kann, lÃ¤sst einen staunen. Die Arena leuchtet jeden Abend nach Sonnenuntergang und man sollte die farbige HÃ¼lle des Stadions einmal gesehen haben.Innen bieten die drei RÃ¤nge von jedem Platz perfekte Sicht auf das Spielfeld. Und nachdem der andere MÃ¼nchner Verein die Arena in Richtung Giesing verlassen hat, kommt nun auch immer mehr Rot in das frÃ¼her komplett graue Stadioninnere. Wie gut es gelungen ist, auf der Nordseite mit den farbigen Sitzen ein FC Bayern-Logo Ã¼ber alle drei RÃ¤nge zu zeichnen, ist beeindruckend.Empfehlung: Eine VIP-Tour buchen. Bei dieser besucht man den Oberrang, eine Loge, den Business Club, die Sponsoren Lounge und darf am Rasenrand auf den AuswechselbÃ¤nken Platz nehmen. Auch den Pressekonferenzraum und die Bayern-Kabine bekommt man zu sehen. Am Ende gibt es einen Sekt-Umtrunk. Man bekommt hier wirklich einen tollen Einblick hinter die Kulissen der Arena.

title: FCB gegen BENFICA Lisabon
text: Super Event, den ich mit meiner Frau, die zum 1.Mal in der Arena war, besucht habe.die PlÃ¤tze optimal, sowie der ganze Abend eine Einladung einer Bank (keine Werbung, war aber auch keine MÃ¼nchner BankğŸ˜) war, Danke gracias âš½ï¸

title: The most modern stadium in Europe.
text: Entrance fees:  â‚¬19.00 (stadium guided tour and Museum)Recommended.The Allianz Arena replaced Munichâ€™s old Olympiastadium. Construction started in October 2002, with a total investment in the project of â‚¬340 million.The impressive Allianz Arena is breath-taking. From the unique faÃ§ade  made up ofÂ diamond-shaped cushionsÂ of air that can be illuminated in more than 16 million colours.The hour-long guided Arena Tour is very informative and interactive. It begins in the middle tier of the stadium, before heading into the lower tier, the press conference room, the players' changing room, sponser lounge, the tunnel where you will live the experience how the footballers feel just before kick-off with the champions league music as a background. You can't access the court like in Madrid or Barcelona.FC Bayern Munich have acquired a 100 percent stake in the Allianz Arena.During 2006 FIFA World Cup six matches were held at the Allianz Arena involving 11 different countries. The Allianz Arena was the venue for the UEFA Champions League final. At national games the capacity of the Allianz Arena has been increased to 75,000 visitors and at international matches to 70,000 visitors.

title: Die Allianzarena ist rot
text: Seit der blaue Verein aus der Allianzarena sich verabschiedet hat, erscheint die Allianzarena nur noch im schÃ¶nen Rot.Hier regiert der FCB und so soll es bleiben.Einen echten MÃ¼nchner geht somit das Herz auf, wenn er zur AA marschiert und das strahlende Rot bereits von der Autobahn oder der U-Bahn Haltestelle sehen kann.

title: Ok, aber...
text: Die Arena an sich ist beeindruckend durch die GrÃ¶ÃŸe und die Aufbauweise. Leider ist der GÃ¤stebereich sehr schlecht gelungen. Auf dem Oberrang und sehr weit gezogen wird gezielt verhindert, dass dort konzentriert Stimmung entsteht. Die Stimmung der Heimfans ist schlechter als in anderen Bundesligstadien. Das wird durch "Showeffekte" und sehr laute Musik aus dem Boden Ã¼bertÃ¶nt - passt in meinen Augen nicht zu einem gewÃ¶hnlichen Bundesligaspiel.

title: Ein Besuch bei Freunden !
text: Sehr gute Abwicklung bei den EingÃ¤ngen ! Die Leute sind sehr hilfsbereit und sehr kompetent !Bargeldloses Zahlen durch Arena-Card verkÃ¼rzt die Wartezeiten bei den Kiosk sehr !Ein Besuch der Allianz Arena ist immer ein Erlebnis !

title: Beeindruckendes Stadion
text: Die Allianz-Arena ist wirklich beeindruckend, besonders der Blick hinab von den OberrÃ¤ngen ist faszinierend. Beim Spiel kann man von Ã¼berall wirklich gut sehen, positiv zu sehen sind auÃŸerdem das kostenlose WLAN sowie die Tatsache, dass man mittlerweile auch problemlos mit Karte zahlen kann und sich nicht mehr die Stadionkarte kaufen muss.Sehr Ã¤rgerlich und absolut vermeidbar sind allerdings die wenigen Sicherheitskontrollen fÃ¼r Frauen. Auf eine Security-Frau beim Einlass kommen 4(!) MÃ¤nner - als Mann ist man somit innerhalb kÃ¼rzester Zeit im Innern, wÃ¤hrend bei den Frauen eine ewige Schlange steht. Ist ja nicht so, dass es bei den Frauen auch noch lÃ¤nger bei der Kontrolle dauert, da die meisten Taschen dabei haben... Absolut unverstÃ¤ndlich, warum man da nicht einfach das Personal sinnvoll Ã¤ndern kann...Ebenso eine Katastrophe war das Nachhausekommen mit der S-Bahn. Vor dem Spiel war noch alles gut, danach wurde leider immer wieder fÃ¼r eine Viertelstunde das Zugangstor zur Bahn aufgrund von ÃœberfÃ¼llung geschlossen. An sich ja okay und sinnvoll, dann sollte man aber vermeiden, dass immer noch hunderte Menschen Ã¼ber eine Seitentreppe in die Station hineinstrÃ¶men. Hier wÃ¤re besser Organisation problemlos machbar!

title: Amazing stadium tour and museum
text: For such a big stadium, I was surprised that it was located in the middle of nowhere on the outskirts of Munich. We had a good look around outside the ground before making our way inside the stadium to buy our tour tickets. Before our tour we had a look around Bayern Munichâ€™s museum. The museum told the story of the clubs triumphs, history and key players and managers.The display of all the Bundesliga titles and DFB Pokel (German FA Cups) were so incredible. But the key display though for me was from the 2013 season with titles from the Bundesliga, DFB Pokel, European Super Cup, World Cup and of course the Champions League.Finally it was time for our tour of the Allianz Arena. Our very animated tour guide called Alfred took us around the stadium to visit the stands, changing rooms, press area and exterior of the stadium.The most notable things I picked up were that the exterior can light up in any colour but they only have planning permission for red (Bayern), blue (1860 Munich) and white (German National Team). However 1860 Munich left the stadium three years ago so it no longer lights up blue.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Breathtaking view
text: Breathtaking view of allianz Arena, even there is no match at all. But, its like an empty town. I bet, it will be full of people if there is a match here.

title: Impressive stadium with knowledgeable tour guide
text: Spent a couple of hours their on a gloomy and cold Saturday afternoon.The museum is interesting and everything is in English and German.Would have liked to have seen more of the older history but the principal focus is the modern era. There seems to be a never ending display of trophies.If you are a hard core Bayern enthusiast then it is a must.If you are a football fan it is interesting.Remarkable range of products from the usual stuff up to toasters and kettles.Stadium tour was at night and quite atmospheric particularly as they were using  of their special lighting that encourages the grass to grow.Not being a Bayern fan I doubt I would go back, but it was an entertaining visit none the less

title: Muy buen lugar para visitar
text: Fuimos a conocer,   Hicimos una visita guiada por el interior, llegamos en metro perfectamente.. es la Ãºltima estaciÃ³n y hay q caminar como 500 m el lugar de la visita es como todos los estadios o parecidos su tienda su recorrido pero es una muy linda atraccion

title: Awesome for hardcore fans
text: The place is really nice and reveals the history of the FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen appropriately. The stadium is quiet huge and can seat about 70,000 people. We took the guided tour in English, although there are tours available in German of course. The guide was telling some really interesting facts about the stadium and also showed all the different rooms- changing room for the players, locker room, the bathing room etc. The Fan shop has a great collection and we took some nice pictures where they photo-shopped us with the players :P Overall experience was great and it is a must visit place for the football fans. The only downside was that you need to walk a lot to get here and there and the cafeteria did not have a great selection of meals.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Muito massa !

title: Amazing
text: It was the best stadium tour we ever done. We had a local guide given by the stadium, very good knowledge and with a very good English. We enjoyed every minute at the stadium.  It's a must if you go to Munich.

title: Meglio lo Stadium di Torino
text: Bellissima struttura, ma lo Stadium di Torino Ã¨ superiore. Molta strada per raggiungerlo dalla metro, guida solo in inglese e tedesco, prezzi piÃ¹ alti di Torino. Diversi punti dedicati ai bambini che permettono di visitare il Museo tranquillamente.

title: Ein must have seen fÃ¼r FC Bayern Fans!
text: Wir waren zur Besichtigung der Allianz Arena mit Erlebniswelt hier. Die ca ein stÃ¼ndige informative FÃ¼hrung durch das Stadion und den Mannschaftkabinen, war fÃ¼r unser Sohn, FuÃŸballer und FC Bayern Fan ein Highlight auf der MÃ¼nchentour. Deshalb empfehlen wir das Ausflugsziel sehr gerne weiter!

title: EXCELENTE ESTADIO
text: Excelente experiencia la visita al estadio.  Impecables instalaciones,  orden y seguridad,  y una visita obligada a la tienda oficial del FC Bayern..... Altamente recomendable ir a ver un partido.

title: Allianz Arena - Home of Bayern Munich
text: I took my wife and 3 boys (aged 10 to 15) to visit the Allianz Arena during December 2018.Aside from being impressed with the excellent of German engineering on display, the tour and visit of the museum and gift shop was one of the highlights of our European trip.

title: Meravigliosa Allianz!
text: Spettacolare!Non si puÃ² dire nientâ€™altro per una struttura del genere.Bella in ogni particolare,in ogni dettaglio.Bellissima vista di sera,illuminata.Merita una visita nella sua completezza,museo e tour.Gentile la guida che ci ha intrattenuto e raccontato divertenti aneddoti per lâ€™intera durata della visita,piacevolissima anche se -avendola visitata a dicembre- le temperature non erano favorevolissime.Merita assolutamente il prezzo del biglietto!

title: Bayern Munich!!
text: So excited to go watch a game. The area is awesome but you have to load a card that they give out for all your purchases. Lots of food and beer choices. Seating is not too tight together. Also, expect a very long walk from where the train drops you off to the stadium. The train is also SUPER PACKED like you will not be able to sit at all and you will be pushed up against others - on the way to and from a game. It's always fun!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Merecida visita
text: ...incluso  para quien ni sea aficionado merece la visita, por ser uno de los mejores estadios del siglo XXI. Excelente tambiÃ©n el proyecto museogrÃ¡fico, ya para los mÃ¡s apasionados al fÃºtbol.

title: Nice experience even if you are not a football fan
text: We visited Allianz Arena because of our 7- Years old son who is big Bayern fan. But all of us have a great time there. We spent almost the all day in Arena. Prices in restaurants are not expensive, pizza is 4,90â‚¬ for example. For young kids there is Spielwelt with climbing wall, legos... really big megastore with everything with FCB logo on it is waiting there too..

title: Tolle Einblicke auch fÃ¼r Nicht-Fans
text: Wir haben das Stadion als Familie besucht und das obwohl wir alle keine FuÃŸball Fans sind. ZunÃ¤chst haben wir eine 1 stÃ¼ndige FÃ¼hrung durch das Stadion gebucht und danach die "Erlebniswelt" besucht. Die FÃ¼hrung war kurzweilig und sehr informativ. Die Erlebniswelt zeichnet eindrucksvoll die Historie des Clubs nach. Audioguides sind verfÃ¼gbar und gut gemacht. Alles in allem eine tolle Erfahrung. Auch fÃ¼r Nicht-Fans!

title: Beeindruckend
text: Wir sind regelmÃ¤ssig in der Allianz Arena. Hier passt alles. Nicht vergessen, man kann nur mit Arena Karte bezahlen. Einziges Mabko: Parken!

text: EstÃ¡dio bonito e organizado. Tem uma megaloja do Bayern de Munique. No inverno a caminhada da estaÃ§Ã£o de trem atÃ© o estÃ¡dio Ã© longa principalmente com crianÃ§as. Recomendo ir para um jogo nÃ£o para uma visita.

title: A ne pas rater !
text: Nous avons fait la visite du stage du Bayern, mÃªme moi qui ne suis pas foot, j'ai adorÃ© dÃ©couvrir ce stade, les vestiaires, les lieux d'interview etc. En prime, la descente des marches des joueurs sur la musique de la champion league... What else? Petit bÃ©mol pas de visite en franÃ§ais, mais mÃªme avec un niveau d'anglais moyen les guides se font largement comprendre. Ã€ faire

text: AÃºn estar alejado esta pegado a la autopista y llega el metro. Recorrido perfecto excepto pisar el cÃ©sped que no nos dejaron.. muy bonito estadio y museo tambiÃ©n vale la pena. Comimos pizzas y frankfurts en los restaurantes que tiene dentro. Vale la pena

title: Interesante
text: EstÃ¡ apartado del centro y vale la pena ir si eres muy futbolero. Aunque la arquitectura es interesante, desplazarse ex profeso si no te gusta el futbol me parece excesivo

title: Tour was AMAZING!!
text: We had a great tour of the place (in English) and got to see the inside of the arena as well as the player facilities.  The museum is awesome with all kinds of interactive things to do and see.  You end in the Mega Store and it was full of great stuff, just didn't have enough room in the suitcases to get all that we wanted home.  It would be nice if they did a VIP tour in English, right now it is only available in German.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Colorato
text: Stadio enorme e colorato, dentro deve essere molto bello. Peccato averlo visto solo dal pullman. Stadio di fama mondiale

title: Un'icona del calcio
text: L'architettura al servizio del calcio. Un passaggio a vedere l'Allianz Arena Ã¨ obbligatorio anche per chi non ama il calcio. L'apertura al pubblico lo rende ancora piÃ¹ accessibile ai tifosi

title: Da visitare col calare del sole
text: Stadio molto bello da visitare..... Shop abbastanza carino con diversi articoli da comprare! Quando diventa buio viene illuminato e diventa bellissimo!

title: Juego de Liga
text: Para llegar en automovil es necesario tomar suficiente tiempo porque las laterales de la autobhan se llenan completamente. Suficiente y fluido el acceso final al estacionamiento. Si vas con familia no recomiendo colocarse tras las porterÃ­as porque las porras se mantienen de piÃ© todo el juego y beben todo el juego.

title: Visita al campo del FC Bayern
text: Visita recomendable para pasar un par de horas con el Tour y visitando el museo. El guÃ­a que tuvimos nos dio muy buenas explicaciones, conocÃ­a el tema y vimos lo mÃ¡s interesante del estadio.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: anche per chi non ama il calcio
text: Non sono una tifosa e non seguo il calcio ma ho voluto fare un regalo al mio compagno e siamo stati all allianz Arena in occasione del nostro viaggio a Monaco.. mi Ã¨ piaciuta tantissimo la visita, sono molto bene organizzati (consiglio, come abbiamo fatto noi, di prenotare i biglietti da casa, perchÃ© le file possono essere davvero lunghe).. la visita all'Arena dura un h e viene fatta con guida in inglese o tedesco.. mentre la visita del museo Ã¨ libera.. durante il tour si visitano gli spogliatoi, la sala stampa, e ovviamente le tribune.. all interno c'Ã¨ anche un buon ristorante ed un negozio di gadget per i tifosiconsiglio anche a chi come me non ama il calcio, Ã¨ cmq una bella esperienza

title: An architectural masterpiece, but the tour was bland.
text: The stadium itself is a marvel. Having experienced other tours throughout Europe I felt that the guide didn't have the passion for it. I don't consider myself a diehard Bayern Munich fan myself, so if I felt this way, I wonder how an avid Bayern follower would have experienced this tour!

title: Great stadium
text: Worth a trip if you are in Munich for a few days. The tour was informative and well organised despite the big crowd during weekends.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

text: Nello stadio sia all'esterno che per quello che abbiamo potuto vedere all'interno. Purtroppo non siamo riusciti a fare la visita guidata. I biglietti erano giÃ  tutti venduti. Se ci andate in periodi 'caldi' turisticamente parlando consiglio di comprare il biglietto del tour con un po' di anticipo in line!

title: muy bonito

title: Avveneristico
text: Stadio all' avanguardia ultra moderno, un vero capolavoro, l' ho visitato di giorno, ma alcuni del luogo mi hanno detto che la sera e' molto bello da vedere perchÃ© si illumina e cambia di colore, veramente uno spettacolo, da visitare interamente con il giro turistico.

title: ExperiÃªncia Ãºnica
text: ExperiÃªncia incrÃ­vel, assistir a um jogo do Bayer de Munique. VÃ¡rios campeÃµes mundiais em campo, experiÃªncia Ãºnica! Arquibancadas lotadas em um frio de 0 graus! Muito bem organizado tanto na entrada quanto na saÃ­da. Cadeiras numeradas e respeitadas. Um verdadeiro espetÃ¡culo!

title: Grand,imposing landmark in Munich and great football arena
text: I visited the Allianz Arena on the 2nd December this year.My visit was an Early bird visit as I wanted to see and visualise the stadium up close in both red and white.So the plan was to arrive at the Allianz Arena while it was still illuminated in red,take a few red selfies and then wait until first light when the stadium changes colour to white and take some white selfies.lol.Due,to tube delays I arrived in enough time to see the stadium in red,but as I was approaching to get that red selfie,first light broke and the stadium changed colour to white.The Allianz Arena is one of the great football stadiums in the world/regular Champions League theatre and I wanted to visit to see this iconic stadium up close.So I achieved that aim,took some great pictures and got some white selfies.I wasn't able to go into the stadium as it was shut at the super early time I was there,but still very much enjoyed seeing this landmark,up close from the outside.Next time I visit Munich I will look to do a stadium tour.Very easy access from Frottmaning U-bahn station.It is about a 10-15 min walk from the station to get close.Soon,as you exit the station you can see this landmark.This ststion is in the white,inner zone for travel on the Munich network,so benefits from the cheaper fare.

title: Tour excelente!
text: Fizemos o tour guiado e foi muito bacana! VocÃª conhece toda a estrutura interna, desde os vestiÃ¡rios, a sala da imprensa, super legal. Para quem Ã© fÃ£ de futebol vale muito a pena!

title: Wieder einmal

title: Quick run through

title: Great Visit to the home of Bayern Munich
text: I am a huge Bayern Munich fan so this visit was like going to the mecca of soccer.  The tour is definitely worth it for even the average soccer fan.  The tour guide was amazing and provider interesting facts and knowledge about the arena, Bayern Munich, and the surrounding area.  The museum in Allianz Arena is very interactive and shows off the hardware that Bayern has collected over the years.  Quite Impressive.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Amazing.
text: One of the most beautiful and biggest stadiums in the world. If you are a football fan no matter who you support this is a must visit

title: Avveniristico.
text: Di passaggio in cittÃ  ho fatto una lunga sosta per ammirare questo capolavoro. Ci ero giÃ  stato qualche anno fa, ma ammirarlo Ã¨ sempre un piacere. Dalla architettura avveniristica e moderna Ã¨ una vera opera d'arte. Dagli spalti la partita si vede bene ed Ã¨ anche sia pulito che tenuto bene. Mi sono intrattenuto con dei tifosi locali che mi hanno raccontato tante cose riguardo a questo stadio ed alla sua squadra. Diconi che quando sia pieno faccia venire i brividi ai tifosi avversari,  e penso sia proprio cosÃ¬.

title: Went to see Bayen Munich play
text: First time to see a football match in Europe ,ground is easy to get to from Munich city centre on the train.Very impressive looking arena and the facilities inside are great despite a big crowd did not have to wait long before to be served be warned they don't take cash you have to get a charge card from a booth in the ground.Even though the match was not the best the atmosphere was amazing.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Munique - Benfica
text: Melhor estÃ¡dio que alguma vez visitei... fantÃ¡stico ambiente e o estÃ¡dio Ã© lindÃ­ssimo... bastante organizado...

title: fabulous time, come prepared!
text: Saw FC Bayern play Nuremburg in December. Arena is beautiful and well maintained, seats all have good views. Easy to get to from subway. Two things: to purchase anything like food and drink you need a special card that you buy at the arena. It's better and quicker to bring cash. We spent 30 euros for beers, wine, brats and fries. If you have money left over you can redeem it outside the stadium. Also, it is cold, and I mean COLD. If you can, layer up like crazy and be prepared. Worth the experience, have fun!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Prima activiteit
text: Met een kombi-ticket een tour gehad door het stadion en het museum bezocht. Leuke activiteit als je wat te weten wilt komen over Bayern MÃ¼nchen. Stadion is goed te bereiken met de metro.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: FC Bayern Munich
text: Easy to go by train and walk almost 1km. My husband is FC Bayern Munich so I have to go inside with him. I never go to football stadium outside of Thailand. It's impressive here.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fantastico!!!
text: Durante un giro a Monaco abbiamo deciso di fermarci a vedere questo stadio e sono felice di aver fatto questa scelta! Ãˆ davvero bellissimo e particolare, a livello strutturale, in particolare allâ€™esterno. Purtroppo non ho potuto vedere tutto gli interni a causa del breve tempo, ma sono riuscita a girarne una buona parte! Se siete in zona Ã¨ da vedere!

title: Great Stop for Soccer Fans in Munich
text: My husband and I decided to go to the stadium on our first afternoon in Munich. Taking the train from Marienplatz is easy- the stop you need to get off at is marked with a soccer ball. You can see the stadium from the train station but it's still about a 15 minute walk. Follow the signs to the right of the building and head up to the ticket counter where you get your combo ticket for the museum and tour. The tour is so fun; you sit in a few different sections of the stadium, see the locker room, walk the tunnel like the players do, and learn all kinds of fun stuff along the way. We had an amazing tour guide who made lots of fun jokes. The museum has tons of Bayern Munich artifacts, you could spend a few hours in there alone. If you want to go on game days you have to have a ticket also for the game. Know that the area between the train station and the stadium is not well lit on non game days so if you are going to be walking through there after the sun sets use the flashlight on your phone. It was SO DARK. and maybe don't walk there alone.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple
